description: Spring recipes to help celebrate this beautiful new season and welcome its unfolding. Crisp asparagus, tender greens, sprightly spring peas, crunchy fennel, earthy spring mushrooms, spring onions, artichokes, and dill. Flavors to tantalize your taste buds!

title: Night at the Oscars
description: Roll out the red carpet and warm up your Thermomix®. Our Oscar collection is inspired by the most delicious food moments from Oscar Nominees. Movie and cooking enthusiasts will find a perfect combination of onscreen recipes inspired by famous films to enjoy in the company of your favorite movie!

title: Low-Carb Cravings
description: Embarking on a low-carb lifestyle doesn’t have to compromise your relationship with food. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner recipes are all covered and include some surprising favorites, such as bread and chocolate chip cookies. All recipes are high in flavor and less than 15 grams of carbs per serving!

title: Eating Well Healthy Gut
description: Eating a balanced diet that is rich in fruits and vegetables provide the fiber needed to build good bacteria and guard gut health. In general, choosing whole foods over processed foods will promote healthy digestion. Let Thermomix® help you make better food choices and eat well for a healthy gut.

title: Pescatarian Fish Friday
description: These fish favorites are hand-picked by our customers, loaded with flavor and nutritional power. Whether you're Pescatarian, observing Lent, or just looking for a lighter alternative to meat, these tasty recipes are well worth discovering.

title: Mardi Gras
description: This festive collection features New Orleans classics such as Creole Style Jambalaya, Red Beans and Rice and the ultimate Mardi Gras dessert--King Cake. Celebrate Carnival season with these delicious recipes that you'll be making long after Fat Tuesday is over. As they say in New Orleans, "Laissez les bons temps rouler," or "Let the good times roll".

title: Healthy Breakfast Weekly Planner
description: Start your day the healthy Thermomix® way! Get inspired to eat a good breakfast every day with a week full of delicious ideas to get your jam-packed days off to a great start.

title: Elevated Plant-Based Cuisine by Matthew Kenney
description: The best of celebrity chef Matthew Kenney’s unique brand of plant-based cuisine. Bringing together culinary art and nutrition, these recipes employ innovative techniques and creative thinking to prepare minimally processed, vibrant and flavorful dishes.

title: Cookidoo® Plated 2021
description: The only thing better than sharing a meal around the table is sharing your food milestones with family and friends. That’s why we created Cookidoo® Plated 2021, an exciting new, mobile-only snapshot of your personal cooking for the year! But don’t let the fun stop there! Check out the top 10 most cooked recipes in the United States in 2021!

title: Time for Tea
description: A whole new world of flavors and combinations awaits you. Explore the Thermomix® Kettle and Warm Up Modes to the fullest and bring your tea to the next level with these trending flavor combinations.

title: Scrumptious Bundt Cakes
description: These scrumptious Bundt cakes are perfect to serve at your next holiday party or any time of year. Moist and delicious and ready to go in oven in 15 minutes or less.

title: DIY Gifting
description: 'Tis the season for gifting and it's never too early to start creating some tasty gifts for family and friends. We have your holiday covered with a delicious roundup of Thermomix®-made gifts for everyone on your list.

title: Sugar Stages TM6 Sweet Success
description: Thermomix® lets you make your own sweet treats to rival any professional baker or candy maker. Explore the easy Sugar Stages mode and get set to impress with success.

title: Holidays at Home
description: This holiday season, Thermomix® is bringing people together to celebrate their love for cooking, good food and shared memories. What’s better than preparing and enjoying a wonderful meal together reminding us how personal human connection remains paramount. As your personal kitchen assistant, Thermomix® makes it easy to follow your own culinary aspirations and ideas for special holiday meals.

title: Then. Now. Always.
description: Discover the recipes that celebrate 50 years of Thermomix®. The Global Anniversary cookbook features the most cooked and top-rated recipes from around the world. We've selected recipes from this magnificent cookbook for you to experience on Cookidoo® and enjoy the incredible evolution and the surprising flavors of Then. Now. Always.

title: Spice Up Your Life
description: Looking to spice up your dinner or jazz up your curries, soups and stews? From Garam Masala to Creole Seasoning, the right spice blend can add something new and exciting, yet familiar and easy, to family dinners and special occasions.

title: Memorable Mac and Cheese
description: Mac and Cheese is a family favorite, loved by children and adults. Creamy cheeses melted into a rich sauce, for the ultimate in cheesy deliciousness. We've compiled our most comforting and memorable Mac and Cheese dishes for you to enjoy every glorious melty bite.

title: Pizza Pizzazz
description: Add a little Pizzazz to your pizza night with these jazzed up doughs and crusts. Top with your favorite toppings and bake until bubbly. Liven up your next pizza party with a homemade flavored pizza dough or crust.

title: Everything Mushrooms
description: Every fall, hundreds of delicious mushroom species spring up from the forest floor...each packed with a unique array of earthy flavors, nutrients, and textures. Discover this extremely versatile ingredient: from soups and sandwiches, to patties, galettes and even desserts.

title: Daily & Creative
description: Daily or Creative-one recipe, two versions to choose from. Whether you want a recipe for everyday or one with a creative twist to impressive your loved ones. These recipes have everything to make your experience with Thermomix® even more complete. One book, two worlds!

title: Breakfast on-the-go
description: They say breakfast is the most important meal of the day and these grab-and-go breakfast ideas will keep you going until lunchtime. These portable options will have you out-the-door in no time and are packed with protein, seeds and grains, giving your body the fuel it needs to start the day off right.

title: Taste of East Asia
description: Let Thermomix® bring the bold flavors of East Asia to your home. Made from scratch and faster than takeout, all these recipes are on the table in 45 minutes or less. Whether you choose our Chicken Pad Thai, a big bowl of Beef Pho or steamy Chili and Peanut Noodles with Tofu, you will love the remarkable flavors and vibrant colors of Asian cuisine.

title: Pineapple Passion
description: Our Independent Consultants are passionate about pineapple, and we are proud to share their passion with you. Bring some smiles to your table with these sunny pineapple recipes and turn your kitchen into a tropical paradise.

title: Salad Dressings
description: Making your own salad dressing is not only simple and easy, but it also tastes better than anything you can buy in a bottle. Whether you choose a creamy classic or a zesty vinaigrette these dressings are a perfect match for salads and make marvelous sauces and marinades for chicken, beef, fish or vegetables. Easy, customizable and they all come together in just a few minutes.

title: Saucy Sous-Vides
description: Let Thermomix® be your step-by-step guide to mastering the simple art of sous-vide cooking. Sample a selection of internationally inspired recipes with flavorful results your family will love!

title: Kid's Corner - I want to be a chef
description: As playful as they are delicious, these whimsical recipes will instill a love of cooking in your little chefs and unlock their creativity.

title: Vintage Desserts
description: From Baked Alaska to a rich and creamy Frozen Custard, we've found our absolute favorite vintage-inspired ice cream desserts. These freezer finales are a perfect indulgence on a hot afternoon or a refreshing end to any meal. With treats this good, you'll find them making a comeback in your kitchen.

title: Vintage Modern Mom
description: Remember the family friendly meals mom used to make? We've recreated your family favorites and brought them into the modern age with a healthy homemade twist. Everything from tasty Salisbury Steak TV Dinners to a Classic Yellow Cake or make your own Velveeta with our Homemade "Velvety" Cheese and Cheesy Mac. These retro recipes are made with everyday ingredients and ready to make a comeback in your Thermomix® home.

title: Simply Steam
description: It's easy to create impressive, multi-layer meals for the whole family. Use your Thermomix® to its full potential, save time and make life easier with these mouthwatering meals.

title: Protein Power Bowls
description: Whether you're a plant lover or a carnivore, there's a protein bowl for you. These bowls are loaded with healthy, lean proteins and jam-packed with so many nutrients that will keep you full and going all day long. A well-balanced and satisfying meal, all in one bowl.

title: Alternative Milks
description: Whether you're vegan, sensitive to dairy or trying to be healthier, nondairy milk alternatives have expanded to include a wide variety of options, all of which maintain a healthy reputation. Thermomix® makes embracing plant-based alternatives and living lactose free easy!

title: Mindfully Mediterranean
description: The Mediterranean way of eating is lower in animal foods, rich in healthy plant foods, whole grains, beans, nuts, seeds and olive oil. Raise a glass of red wine and enjoy a delicious and healthy way of eating.

title: Fermentation with TM6
description: Fermented foods taste amazing and play an important role in supporting digestive health. With controlled humidity and temperature, Thermomix® TM6™ Fermentation mode is perfect for making yogurts, proofing doughs and so much more. We can't wait for you to experience the magic of fermentation!

title: Jump Start Juices
description: Start the new year light! Increasing the fruits and vegetables in your diet can help you break unhealthy habits and improve your mind, body and spirit.

title: Ritz-Carlton, New Orleans
description: Step into the French Quarter with Thermomix®, chef Connault and Degrenne. Thermomix® will help you create an authentic New Orleans setting in your home. Laissez les bon temps rouler (let the good times roll) and celebrate the joys of living.

title: Alternative Risottos
description: Change things up and discover delightful new textures and delicious flavors with alternate grains in your next risotto. The grains are cooked to an al dente consistency which means they are "firm to the tooth". Experiment with these savory risottos and find your new favorites.

title: Eggscellent Egg Cooker
description: If you like eggs, then you're going to love the Egg Cooker mode! Cook eggs to your desired cooking point consistently every time without waiting for the water to boil or standing over a hot stove. Just place 2-6 eggs into the bottom of the mixing bowl, add water to the 1 liter mark and choose your cooking point. Get ready to enjoy your eggs exactly how you like them without the fuss.

title: Simply PreClean
description: Get ready to enjoy our enhanced Pre-clean mode! Now you can choose between four pre-cleaning variations and enjoy making caramel without the worry of clean up. Stuck-on dough -- no problem, fats or caramel and even a browned bottom are no match for the new Pre-clean mode. Now cleanup is a breeze.

title: Holiday Favorites with Chef Bill Yosses
description: Get inspired with a Holiday Menu from Bill Yosses. Delicious recipes that utilize fresh local ingredients with an eye out for unnecessary fats, alternate sources of protein and the use of nutrient dense sources. Recipes include ingredients that are known to contain anti-oxidants, immune boosting qualities, anti-aging, anti-cancer properties and anti-inflammatory ingredients that add balance and flavor to your special  holiday dishes.

title: Cha Cha Chicken
description: With common pantry ingredients you can create chicken recipes from around the world. Preparing a colorful and aromatic array of palate-pleasing poultry dishes will take your dinner game to the next level.

title: Stoneware Baking Essentials
description: Achieve the best culinary results for your favorite recipes, with food that tastes like it has come straight out of a brick oven. Our stoneware collection and Thermomix® are your new kitchen essentials for hearty casseroles, crispy pizza, crusty breads and more.

title: Make Ahead - Warm Up
description: With our new Warm Up mode foods are heated to an even temperature throughout the dish. You can heat milk without boiling, evenly heat baby food without dangerous hot spots. Perfect for reheating stews, casseroles and soups without breaking up the pieces and so much more.

title: Cookalong Lunch
description: With Thermomix® you can cookalong with renowned chefs Bill Yosses, Shola Olunloyo and Lynette MacDonald while we guide you through their fall favorites.

title: Cookidoo Kids Corner - Chocolate
description: Want to learn fun facts and help your family in the kitchen? Visit our Kids' Corner on Cookidoo®! Get ready to roll out some dough, cut out cookies and have fun decorating cake pops! From chocolate bars to a cute caterpillar cake, you can find tasty recipes, activites and learn some fun food facts - all in our special corner made just for you.

title: Cookidoo Kids Corner - Picnic
description: Want to learn fun facts and help your family in the kitchen? Visit our Kids' Corner on Cookidoo®! Push up your sleeves and get ready to decorate muffins, roll out dough and use cookie cutters to make the tastiest sandwiches ever! From rainbow pizza to chocolate carrot muffins, you can find tasty recipes, activites and learn some fun food facts - all in our special corner made just for you.

title: Summer Favorites
description: Summertime is prime time for fresh produce. Make the most of the season's bounty with these easy summer recipes. From breakfast to dessert, berries to tomatoes these tasty recipes highlight the freshest fruits and vegetables of the season.

title: Consultant Favorites
description: We are honored our Independent Consultants have submitted their cherished family favorites to share with you on Cookidoo®. We are pleased to present these recipes for you to enjoy and share these heavenly sweets with your family and friends.

title: Frozen Desserts
description: Nothing beats the summer heat than a cold, sweet dessert.  From fruity popsicles to creamy confections, chilling with Thermomix® couldn't be easier.

title: Dips, Spreads and Butters
description: Enhance the flavor and texture of your favorite foods with these tasty and budget friendly dips, spreads and butters. From savory blends for baguettes to creamy spreads for crackers... and butters that will turn a steak into a delicious mouth-watering experience, there's sure to be a recipe that will fit your dipping needs perfectly.

title: Indoor Picnic
description: Whatever the weather may hold, keep your family in a picnic-perfect mood and dine in the great indoors. Skip the table, lay a blanket on the floor and set out lots of napkins because everything is more delicious when eaten at a picnic.

title: Smart Cooking with Thermomix® and Hestan Cue™
description: Smart Cooking technology delivers remarkable control with superior cooking precision. Thermomix® and Hestan Cue™ brings this latest technology into your kitchen. Together we guide you step-by-step to perfectly cooked dishes.

title: Sourdough Baking - with Starter Discard
description: If you're making sourdough bread, you're going to have a lot of extra sourdough starter. Don't throw out your sourdough discard, use it to add incredible flavor and texture to pancakes, waffles, cookies, crackers and more. Amazing flavor with no waste.

title: Artisan Breads
description: From sourdough to pretzel bread, making bread at home can be a deeply rewarding journey. The secret to good bread is knowing how to wait. Wait for the yeast to form, the dough to rise and for the crust to become crispy in the oven. With the ease of Thermomix®...creating a delicious soft, tender crumb or a crisp, chewy crust with those signature soft holes are just a bake away.

title: Kids in the Kitchen - #athomewiththermomix
description: Take advantage of the extra time with the kids and prepare some fun and delicious treats. Keep those little hands busy with garnishing and decorating and enjoy some quality time and satisfying snacks together with Thermomix®.

title: Pantry Magic - #athomewiththermomix
description: Enjoy delicious and comforting home-cooked meals and take advantage of what's already in your pantry. Get dinner on the table fast and easy with Thermomix® .

title: Facebook Live Favorites
description: Enjoying watching Facebook live with Lynette MacDonald? Our Facebook Favorites Collection allows you make these recipes in your home. With Guided Cooking, the simplest to the most complex recipes are easy to make with success. Save this collection to "My Recipes" and you will continually have new recipes at your fingertips!

title: TM Basics – Chopping and Steaming
description: Learn the basics for chopping and steaming meat, poultry, fish, vegetables and fruit with Thermomix®. Master these basics for use in your favorite recipes to save time and effort.

title: Stock Your Staples
description: A well-stocked pantry allows you to whip up meals quickly. Make your own baking mix, butter and seasonings from scratch and fill your pantry with real food staples. Use these basic, versatile ingredients frequently to save time and money.

title: Paleo A Clean Bake
description: Following a Paleo lifestyle shouldn't leave you feeling restricted or deprived! We’ve rounded up some of our best Paleo-friendly baked goodies to delight everyone at the table.

title: Superfoods Immunity Boost
description: A strong immune system helps you stay healthy during the flu season. Feed your body well and keep your immune system running strong with these superfood recipes.

title: Hollywood Romance with Rob & Patricia Schneider
description: Hollywood power couple Rob and Patricia Schneider bring their selection of Thermomix® favorites to your table. Simple and comforting, these recipes will soon become your family’s choice for special occasions throughout the year.

title: Keto Meal Prep by flavcity Part 1
description: With the help of Bobby Parrish, Keto expert and best-selling author of the Keto Meal Prep cookbook, your Thermomix® will become a delicious gateway to your health goals this year.

title: Keto Meal Prep by flavcity Part 2
description: With Bobby Parrish’s delicious low carb recipes, and the versatility of Thermomix®, you can quickly turn clean, whole ingredients into satisfying Keto meals.

title: Homemade Yogurt
description: Homemade yogurt is so easy to make. All you need is a few simple ingredients, a couple jars and your Thermomix®. Whether you prefer whole milk, Greek or dairy-free your homemade yogurt will quickly rival the best store-bought yogurt.

title: Taste of Time
description: Step back in time and enjoy the simple elegance and refined Biltmore style right in your own home. Thermomix® makes it easy to recreate these signature classics for your family and friends.

title: Slow Cooking
description: Gut Ding will Weile haben - Gulasch und Pulled Pork auch! Entdecke mit dem Slow Cooking Modus deines Thermomix® TM6 köstliche Schmorgerichte, die die ganze Familie begeistern!

title: Craft Mocktails
description: Whether you’re not a drinker or you just need a break from the booze, these mocktails will *not* disappoint. Non-alcoholic mocktails are delicious and kid friendly. Customize with your favorite alcohol and spike things up!

title: Rice Cooker
description: The new Rice Cooker mode makes fail-proof rice and grain dishes. The mode is developed to sense the water to rice ratios and completes the cooking process with consistent results every time. This basic collection will have you creating delicious side dishes or delectable mains with just a start of the mode.

title: Thickening with TM6
description: Making sauce with the new Thermomix® Thicken mode means that you can rely on delicious consistent results every time. Whether you're looking for sweet or savory, we have fail-proof sauces at your fingertips.

title: Sous-Vide
description: Sous-vide cooking offers unparalleled temperature control, creating deliciously tender meat, fish and vegetables. These recipes will get you started using the Sous-vide mode on your Thermomix® TM6®.

title: Basic Meat & Seafood
description: Give your dishes more flavor, by browning meat or sautéing poultry, pork and shrimp. Use High Temp. mode in these recipes as a starting point for your own flavorful dishes.

title: Comfort Cravings

title: Basic Vegetables

title: Basic Onions
description: Sautéing, browning or caramelizing adds an irresistible sweet and savory note to your dishes. Learn the basics of High Temp. mode and bring out the flavor in your own recipe creations.

title: Table for Two
description: Treat your loved one to a gourmet dinner at home. Try our favorite romantic recipes and impress your date with one of our delicious and easy dinner ideas and see where the night takes you.

description: Comfort food for all ages! Rediscover everything you loved about your favorite childhood combo. Fill your cravings with our winning twist on these sweet and salty treats.  Soon to become a new staple in your home.

description: Whether you are an Independent Consultant, customer or novice cook, these recipes will help you master the basic Thermomix® functions. From drinks to desserts, mix and match to customize your menu.

title: All Things Eggs
description: From weekend brunch to dessert, take your eggs to the next level with a variety of nutritious recipes that satisfy the whole family. Master the basics with Thermomix® and cook up eggsactly what you are craving.

title: Keto Friendly
description: Help turn your body into a fat-burning machine. Our Keto-friendly recipes allow you to focus on eating good quality, minimally processed food.

title: Fresh Bread Basics
description: Starting with basic bread recipes is the key to confident baking. Thermomix® takes the intimidation out of bread making. These recipes come together so quickly you can enjoy the aroma of fresh bread any day of the week.

title: Saucy Sautés
description: Loaded with crisp, colorful veggies and tossed with flavorful sauces for tasty, satisfying meals with minimal effort. Sauce up your weeknight dinners with these sautéed dishes.

title: Everyday Vegan
description: Whether you’re a carnivore, vegetarian or vegan these recipes will satisfy without sacrificing taste. Hearty yet wholesome, everyone will enjoy these delicious plant-based recipes.

description: America’s most prominent chefs share their favorite recipes using Thermomix®. Cooking extraordinary, restaurant-quality dishes in the comfort of your home has never been easier.

description: Back to Basics with Thermomix® gives you quick and easy recipes to hone your Turbo, Kneading and Chopping skills. Mastering these basic functions will have you in and out of the kitchen in no time.

description: From sweet-and-savory mains to comforting treats and desserts, this tempting collection of recipes offers fresh and satisfying ways to enjoy the harvest of fall's favorite fruit.

description: Try your hand at making homemade pasta from scratch with these classic Italian recipes.

description: It's time to celebrate the wonderful father figures in our lives. The day when fathers are recognized for encouraging, empowering, providing and protecting. Celebrate the great man you call dad and mix up a delicious Thermomix® recipe he’ll love!

description: 'Tis the season for fresh summer fare! From breakfast through to decadent dessert, these recipes feature the most colorful fresh fruits and vegetables from local farmers' markets.

title: Very Strawberry
description: Now strawberry lovers can enjoy their favorite fruit from appetizer through dessert. That's right—sweet or savory, warm or chilled, there's a fresh treat here to delight everyone.

title: Baby to Table
description: Take full control of your baby's health, from soft first foods to more textured toddler meals. For an optimal start, choose from these tasty blends full of natural nutrition.

title: Spring Forward
description: This is the season where everything feels light and lovely— and daily meals should be no exception. Refresh your table with the vibrant colors and flavors of a sunny spring day!

title: Healthier Eating
description: Bring the flavors and colors of natural foods to your table and feel good about the meals you serve. This selection of recipes comes alive with vibrant healthy ingredients.

description: Your special person deserves a special dinner on this day! Choose from light and lovely to deeply decadent and serve your Valentine something extra special, homemade with love.

description: They'll sing your praises while serving these enticing, artful cocktails to guests. As fresh and seasonally delicious as they are pretty. Big cheers to you, the party starts now!

description: From starters, through stuffing, to dessert—put a fresh spin on the traditional flavors of your Christmas dinner table. Impressive family celebrations made easy, with Thermomix®.

title: Holiday Sweets
description: For festive treats that taste of home and remind us of family times—these are the recipes you'll return to every year. Thermomix® helps make holiday baking more fun than ever.

title: Holiday Feast
description: It's time for everyone's favorite feast. Start up your Thermomix, set the table, and they'll soon be passing the homemade gravy!

title: Pumpkin and Spice
description: It's time to get pumped for Pumpkin! From breakfast through dessert, you'll enjoy this sweet collection of fun and easy recipes for the most spiced-friendly of fall vegetables.

description: Take your salad skills to the next level with these sensational recipes. Served as stand-alone healthy meals or as hearty sides--they pack a lot of flavor into every forkful.

title: Veggie Table

title: Picnic

description: Think outside the box to create some innovative additions for your next bbq party. From savory to sweet, and developed by a grill chef, there's something tasty here for everyone.

title: You Knead This
description: Don't be shy, give kneading a try! Explore how easy it is to let Thermomix ® do the work for a wide range of treats you can now bake at home—with just the touch of a button.

title: Better Burgers
description: Enjoy the satisfaction of building the most authentic, mouthwatering burgers from scratch. These tempting flavor combinations and sauces let you serve from the grill like a pro.

title: Pizza
description: If you need an excuse to make pizza, we're giving you plenty! Break away from tradition with fun and easy dessert pizzas, pizza dough creations, and tempting new flavor combos.

title: Portugal to Greece
description: The Mediterranean region is known for flavorful cuisine and this recipe sampler is a great way to tease your taste buds with vibrant dishes from Spain, Portugal, Italy and Greece.

title: The Basic Cookbook
description: Get to know Thermomix® and explore an easier way of cooking. You'll soon be returning to these useful tips and simple recipes on a daily basis for successful home-cooked meals.

title: Go Nuts
description: So good and so nutritious, nuts make any recipe taste even better. Discover how easy it is to make tasty treats to share and enjoy with others — or squirrel them away for yourself…

title: Weekend Meals
description: It's time to redefine your week-end with leisurely home-cooked meals. Thermomix® introduces a new level of fun and satisfaction in the kitchen while preparing great-tasting dishes.

title: Chocoholics
description: People who love chocolate can never get enough. Now you can satisfy those cravings in yourself and others with a rich range of chocolate recipes--from drinks to decadent deserts.

title: Mix, Grab and Go!
description: We're often rushed at lunch time, so it's a treat to relax with a bite of real home-cooked food. Prepare these quick and easy recipes to perk up lunches while at home, work, or play.

title: Detox juices
description: Thinking about detox? Don't put it off any longer! Vibrant and nutritious juice combinations are at your fingertips when you add these recipes to your plan for a healthier body.

title: Everyday Cookbook
description: Make the most of your Thermomix® by using it every day. With so many recipes to choose from, it's easy to make home-cooked breakfasts, lunches, and dinners--and don't forget dessert!

title: U.S. Digital Flipbook
description: Experience the versatility of Thermomix® TM6® in action with our digital flipbook. This curated recipe flow showcases its multifunctional capabilities, providing a hands-on opportunity to see how it fits into your kitchen. Discover delicious recipes, ease of use, and Create Wow Everyday with Thermomix®.

title: Gluten free
description: You're in complete control of your gluten free lifestyle with easy-to-follow recipes using healthy items from your own pantry.

title: For Kids
description: Is it time to break out of the usual routine and prepare some kid-friendly food? Why not let them choose something for themselves from this collection of fun and flavorful recipes?

title: Cookies For All
description: Everyone loves the smell of cookies baking and Thermomix® makes it so easy. Fill up the cookie jar with a sampling of some of the world's most popular cookies and biscuits--homemade!

title: Breakfast and brunch
description: Perk up your morning routine by mixing up some new breakfast inspirations. With everything from sweet to savory, you can grab it and go or linger at the week-end table over brunch.

title: Cook It with Steam!
description: Take your Thermomix® skills to the next level--with steam cooking. It's easier than you think with Varoma. Choose a flavor-filled meal or luscious dessert and start steaming today!

title: Cheese Please!
description: Thermomix® is the cheese-lover's friend! It's so easy to grate, cook, or melt cheese dishes all in one pot to save time. Try new flavors and bring smiles to the table, with cheese.

title: Taste of Home
description: America has come a long way since grandmothers spent their days in the kitchen preparing family meals. Today Thermomix ® helps us serve up the home-cooked flavors of our childhood.

title: Italian Pasta
description: How many ways can you love pasta? Explore a variety of pasta shapes, try new flavor combos and revisit favorite comfort foods. There's something here for everyone, and every night.

title: Pump Up the Jam
description: Let Thermomix® lead the way to DIY jams. It's never been easier to make natural, great tasting additive-free jams from scratch. Give these sweet flavors a spin and pump up your jam!

title: Asian Flavors
description: A selection of flavorful Asian recipes from Thailand and beyond. Not the usual take-out dishes--these tasty authentic meals are easily mixed with fresh ingredients, right at home.

title: Great to Share
description: It is so easy to fix great snacks and appies when Thermomix® is in the house. These quick dips and spreads are perfect for sharing and taste great with bread, crackers, or veggies.

title: Mixed Drinks
description: What better way to give Thermomix® a spin than by mixing a refreshingly good drink! Enjoy raising your glass with this new collection of fun flavors to help celebrate.

title: Baby's First Foods
description: Moms around the world rely on Thermomix® for making pure, nutritious, cost-saving baby food at home. When the time is right for solid food, giving your baby the best start is easy.

title: Spice Mixes and Rubs
description: Discover a world of flavours with our Spice Mixes and Rubs collection. From a spicy Jerk Spice Rub to a warming Pumpkin Spice Mix, these simple recipes will elevate every dish.

title: Thermomix Like Never Before
description: Thermomix® TM7 is a unique and extremely versatile kitchen appliance, and the best - and only - way to truly experience it is through a demonstration. Hosting a demo gives you the chance to try it out, see TM7's innovative features in action, enjoy delicious dishes and explore how it can transform your kitchen.

title: In Homemade We Trust
description: There’s a unique joy in making meals yourself - whether you’re taking your time or keeping it quick with frozen veggies or canned goods. We all have days when fast food or a microwave meal is just what we need - no shame in that! But when we can, we believe homemade food tastes better, feels better, and can even be a more sustainable, economical choice.

title: Every Season Is a Healthy Season
description: We prioritise seasonal products in our shopping basket for a more natural, healthier, and sustainable choice. With Cookidoo®, explore recipes that highlight fresh ingredients year-round. High five, Mother Nature!

title: Our Kitchens Are A Window To The World
description: Travel the world without leaving home with thousands of international recipes on Cookidoo® - today, a Japanese dinner; tomorrow, a Parisian breakfast. Global flavours are at your fingertips, no plane ticket required!

title: There's Always Room At Our Table
description: Sharing and inclusivity lie at the heart of cooking, and Cookidoo® helps you prepare meals that bring people together - be it a cosy family dinner or a grand celebration. You can leave behind the stress and focus on what truly matters: enjoying delicious food and cherished moments with the people you love.

title: We Can Switch To Chef Mode In A Flash
description: Transform your home into the fanciest restaurant in town! With Cookidoo®, you can confidently master new techniques such as sous-vide or create perfect bread doughs, whether you're a beginner or an experienced cook.

title: We Can Work Magic Out Of Simple Things
description: There's something truly magical about turning an everyday ingredient - like broccoli - into a vibrant, delicious salad in no time. With Cookidoo®, you'll find all the ideas you need to make the most of what you have; adding a chef-like touch to even the simplest meals.

title: We Celebrate Our Uniqueness
description: In our kitchen, everyone is welcome - vegans, meat lovers, picky kids, and solo chefs alike. With Cookidoo®, our wide range of recipes reflects the diversity of tastes and lifestyles, making sure there's something for everyone to enjoy!

title: Heart Healthy, Mind Healthy
description: Taking care of your heart health is important. Our Heart Healthy, Mind Healthy cooking class offers the opportunity to explore recipes that are not only beneficial for your health but also enjoyable for the whole family. Visit www.vorwerk.co.uk to find a cooking class near you.

title: West African
description: Explore iconic West African dishes like Jollof Rice, Amala, Moi Moi, and Suya Beef Skewers. Each recipe captures the essence of traditional cooking, combining ingredients and spices that celebrate West African culinary heritage. Whether you're new to West African cuisine or a seasoned enthusiast, this collection offers an introduction into some of the most popular recipes from the region.

title: Flourish Over Fifty
description: This collection is designed for women over fifty, offering recipes that support well-being and vitality. Featuring nutrient-rich ingredients helping you embrace this stage of life with every meal. In addition to their health benefits, these recipes are delicious and can be enjoyed by anyone.

title: St. Patrick's Day
description: Celebrate St. Patrick's Day this year with delicious recipes inspired by the Emerald Isle. From a smooth and warming potato soup to indulgent Irish cream and pistachio fudge, you'll find our favourite Irish dishes in this collection, all made easily with Thermomix®.

title: Feed the Love
description: This Valentine's Day, celebrate love in all its forms. Bake and decorate biscuits for friends and family, host an afternoon tea with your girlfriends or create a romantic dinner for two with delicious cocktails, starters, mains and desserts.

title: Polish Favourites
description: Discover the flavours of Poland with this collection. Delight in Polish favourites such as Pickled Cucumber Soup (Zupa z kiszonych ogórków) and Minced Meat Cutlets (Kotlety mielone). Or if you're in the mood for something sweet, Polish Doughnuts (Pączki) make the perfect sweet treat.

title: Discover Thermomix® Online
description: Our new, express online demonstration is the perfect introduction to Thermomix®. As well as finding out all the ways, that Thermomix® can help you in your cooking, here are some of the recipes you might see or hear about in a virutal demo.

title: Free From Basics
description: Whether you're following a specific diet due to allergies, intolerances or personal preference, you'll find vegan biscuits, dairy-free ice creams and more in this collection full of basic free-from recipes. Whip up quick sauces, treats or sides without compromising on flavour.

title: A Touch of Sparkle
description: Add a touch of sparkle to your dinner table with this collection. Full of recipes to elevate any occasion, from glittering cocktails to shimmering desserts all to celebrate the launch of our new sparkling white TM6.

title: A Very Thermomix® Christmas
description: From traditional roast turkey and all the trimmings, to canapés, cocktails and edible gifts, this collection of mouth-watering festive favourites is the ultimate celebration of Christmas.

title: Autumn Comforts
description: As the nights draw in, Autumn Comforts are exactly what we need. From warming Apple and Cinnamon Swirled Bread to a family favourite Roast Chicken with veg, this collection has everything you need for cosy, delicious meals at home. All these recipes are perfect for the new Varoma® Casserole.

title: Taste of Thermomix®: Festive Entertainment
description: Discover the recipes from our Taste of Thermomix® cooking class, tailored for entertaining during the holidays. From a quick dip to a refreshing yet moreish salad, these dishes are designed to make hosting a breeze! Go to Vorwerk.co.uk to find your nearest cooking class and see these recipes in person.

title: Taste of Thermomix®: Gift Giving
description: Explore the recipes from our Taste of Thermomix® cooking class, designed for gifting during Christmas. From spiced cookies to homemade jam, these recipes offer thoughtful and tasty options for holiday giving. Go to Vorwerk.co.uk to find your nearest cooking class and see these recipes in person.

title: Taste of Thermomix: Eat Real Food
description: Eating real food is so important but sometimes you don't know where to start. Our Taste of Thermomix®: Eat Real Food cooking class will show you how easy it is to eat healthier and help change your lifestyle in the kitchen. Visit our website www.vorwerk.co.uk to find a cooking class near you.

title: Birthday Cakes
description: Featuring fun and easy birthday cakes perfect for all ages, this collection has cakes for football fanatics or magical unicorn fans. Whether you're planning a small gathering or a big party there's a cake for everyone. These whimsical designs are ideal for beginner cake decorators looking to make a birthday celebration extra special.

title: Baking Inspiration
description: Explore some inspiring baking recipes ranging from breads to desserts, including some of our most popular and delicious on Cookidoo®.

title: Sweet Inspiration
description: Explore some inspiring sweet recipes ranging from layer cakes to protein balls, including some of our most popular and delicious on Cookidoo®.

title: Keto
description: Ideas to prepare delicious and practical low-carb recipes if you are looking to follow a Keto diet. All these selected recipes have less than 15 g of net carbs per portion.

title: Sun-Sational Savings
description: Enjoy our specially selected Sun-Sational Savings collections, designed to be as delicious as possible, without breaking the bank! From pasta to curry, feed your family with these varied, pocket-friendly meals. This collection features 5 weekday meals for a family of 4, costing under £20/€15. Prices correct as of June 2024.

title: Your First Month Mixing
description: Congratulations on starting your Thermomix® journey! Here, we have put together 28 delicious and easy recipes to help you get to know your Thermomix® TM6. Ask your Advisor for more information about Your First Month Mixing.

title: It's My Birthday!
description: They grow up so fast… Here’s to our beloved TM6 turning 5 years old! Party with some of our most popular cakes and drinks to  celebrate half a decade!

title: Taste of England
description: Indulge in traditional English treats. From scotch eggs to Yorkshire puddings and raspberry ripple ice cream, there is something for everyone! Let Thermomix® help you make your favourite English recipes at home.

title: Taste of Wales
description: Why not try some traditional Welsh dishes from Glamorgan Sausages and comforting pies to Bara Brith or mouth-watering Welsh Cakes. This collection will have you delving deeper into Welsh delicacies.

title: Taste of Scotland
description: Showcasing the flavours of Scotland, this collection features classics like Mince and Tatties and a moreish Dundee Cake. These comforting Scottish recipes will be soon become new favourites.

title: Taste of Ireland
description: Dive into a collection full of Irish favourites. From hearty stews and moreish Soda Bread, to sweet treats like Chocolate Guinness Cake, every recipe will transport you straight to the Emerald Isle.

title: Taste of Thermomix®
description: Making your own Indian cuisine at home doesn’t need to be complicated. Our Taste of Thermomix® India cooking class will help you learn and expand your culinary knowledge. This collection brings together recipes you'll get to try at the class, so if you love them, you'll be able to cook them at home yourself. Visit our website www.vorwerk.co.uk to find a cooking class near you.

title: Let's Mix Again!
description: Have you been to one of our cooking classes yet? This collection brings together the recipes you might get to try at our popular Let’s Mix Again class so you can try making them yourself at home. Visit our website www.vorwerk.co.uk to find a cooking class near you.

title: 5 Ingredients
description: For some people, getting home-cooked food on the table every day can be daunting, but with 5 Ingredients, we really are making it as easy and delicious as possible. From grab-and-go breakfasts and quick, weekday dinners to packed lunches and a cheeky tipple at the weekend, we are keeping it simple and celebrating each and every one of the ingredients used.

title: Slicing and Grating
description: This new collection is full of recipes that make food prep an absolute breeze. We’ve packed in delectable dishes from Southeast Asia, to classic British pairings like strawberries and cream. Whatever cuisine you desire, make it speedy and healthy with Thermomix® Cutter!

title: Thermomix® Cutter Welcome Booklet
description: The Thermomix® Cutter accessory will make your dishes impressive – and impressively easy. Slice and grate ingredients quickly to add texture to your salads, create beautiful desserts or even make your own crisps. Find recipes full of inspiration to create a whole new look and feel to your mealtimes.

title: Thermomix® Cutter
description: Inspired by a variety of different cuisines, this collection brings together recipes that showcase how easy it is to achieve impressive results with the aid of the Thermomix® Cutter. From a classic French onion soup to fajitas or delicate fruit tarts, the possibilities are endless.

title: Philadelphia
description: Indulge in the creaminess that is Philadelphia. We've teamed up to bring you a collection full of delicious dishes, with a spin on the classic brownie to a Chorizo and Chive Gnocchi perfect for date night.

title: Best of Easter
description: We've put all your top-rated and most loved Easter recipes into one exciting collection! Bake colourful treats, dye eggs to decorate, enjoy freshly baked hot cross buns and decorate chocolate eggs with your loved ones this Easter.

title: #FoodGoals
description: Explore our collection of mouthwatering recipes that are taking social media by storm. These dishes will spark your creativity, helping you transform everyday ingredients into exciting new flavour and texture combinations.

title: Slicing and Grating (TM5)
description: This new collection is full of recipes that make food prep an absolute breeze. We’ve packed in delectable dishes from Southeast Asia, to classic British pairings like strawberries and cream. Whatever cuisine you desire, make it speedy and healthy with Thermomix® Cutter!

title: Afternoon Tea
description: Be inspired to create this British tradition at home: from delicate finger sandwiches and savoury éclairs to creative sweet pastries and cakes, all enjoyed with pots of tea.

title: Pizza Perfection
description: From pepperoni to veggie, stuffed crust to thin and crispy, there's no doubt about it: we are a nation of pizza lovers. Gone are the days when a simple Margherita pizza was the only item on the menu, the possibilities are now endless when it comes to choosing your base, sauce and toppings.

title: Demo
description: As a unique, extremely versatile kitchen appliance, we believe a cooking experience is the best – and only – way to see the Thermomix® in action. It gives you the chance to try it out, taste the delicious results and see how it fits into your kitchen. These are some of the recipes you expect to wow you when host a demonstration in your home.

title: Get Inspired
description: Why not try something you've never tried before and get inspired. Recipes from different cuisines, such as Squid with Ginger and Soy and bakes to suit the seasons, with a delicious Summer Fruits Parcel. We want you unleash your inner chef and try something new.

title: Plant-based Around the World
description: Explore the world of cuisines on a plant-based plate. Whether you're committed to a vegan lifestyle or just exploring plant-based recipes, this collection featuring Mexican delights and warming curries will not only expand your plant-based culinary repertoire but also help you make delicious and healthy recipes for the whole family.

title: Thermomix® Sensor: Christmas
description: For the first time, make Christmas stress-free with Thermomix® Sensor. With our newest accessory, you’ll know the exact time to take your turkey out of the oven, or how long to cook your roast beef for your preferred doneness. Now you can really give your full attention to those board games.

title: Festive Dinner Party
description: The festive period is all about getting together with loved ones and sharing good food! This collection has everything you will need to host your own dinner party. From Christmassy cocktails to delicious mains, and tempting desserts, we have no doubt it will go down a treat.

title: Cream Cheese
description: Cream cheese is so versatile and the perfect addition to lift any dish. Whether it’s a creamy savoury cheesecake perfect for a dinner party, or an easy mac ‘n’ cheese you can throw together for a mid-week dinner, this collection has something for everyone.

title: Thermomix® Sensor: Getting Started
description: For the launch of our brand new Thermomix® Sensor, we have brought together some of your favourite recipes - all compatible with Thermomix® Sensor. We've included different types of category from basic doughs to rich doughs, basic fruit cakes to rich cakes, and also added meat, poultry and fish recipes as well. Start your Sensor journey here!

title: First Class
description: Have you been to one of our cooking classes yet? Just one of a wide range of classes, the First Class is a great way to explore the culinary possibilities available to you after purchasing a Thermomix®. This collection brings together the recipes you might get to try at your first class so you can recreate the magic yourself at home. Visit our website www.vorwerk.co.uk to find a cooking class near you.

title: 140 Years: Celebrating with Bubbles
description: How time flies! 140 years ago, Vorwerk was established – the company that produces your beloved Thermomix®. Celebrate our anniversary with decadent recipes suited to all kinds of festivities with friends and family. Here’s to 140 more!

title: King's Coronation
description: Whether you're looking for a centrepiece for your Big Lunch, finger food for your street party or some pastries for an afternoon tea, this collection has all the inspiration you need to get ready for the King's coronation. Why not try one of our favourite quiches, a refreshing beverage or a classic coronation chicken?

title: Free From
description: Whether you have a food allergy or food intolerance, have friends or family who do or are reducing certain ingredients from your diet as a lifestyle choice, the recipes from this cookbook will provide you with plenty of inspiration. These delicious recipes were curated with four 'free-froms' in mind: gluten free, dairy free, egg free and free from refined sugar. From gluten-free pastas to egg-free cakes, free-from cooking couldn't be easier with Thermomix®.

title: Irish Cooking
description: Rachel Allen is a bestselling cookery writer, TV chef, celebrated teacher at the world-famous Ballymaloe Cookery School and a Thermomix® brand ambassador. From a hearty cottage pie topped with colcannon mash to a simple apple cake, we are delighted to be showcasing this collection of comforting, Irish recipes, written for us by Rachel.

title: Ruby Bhogal
description: We’ve joined forces with Ruby Bhogal, star baker from The Great British Bake Off, to bring you 6 flavour filled recipes. These recipes are modern twists on British classic treats, but are also inspired by Ruby’s Indian roots.

title: Fermentation Mode
description: With controlled humidity and temperature, Fermentation mode is perfect for making yoghurts and proving doughs. Why not try the Stracciatella Drinking Yoghurt or prove the dough for your own Ciabiattine?

title: Thermomix Cutter (TM5)
description: Inspired by a variety of different cuisines, this collection brings together recipes that showcase how easy it is to achieve impressive results with the aid of the Thermomix® Cutter. From a classic French onion soup to fajitas or delicate fruit tarts, the possibilities are endless.

title: Thermomix Cutter Welcome Booklet (TM5)
description: The Thermomix® Cutter accessory will make your dishes impressive – and impressively easy. Slice and grate ingredients quickly to add texture to your salads, create beautiful desserts or even make your own crisps. Find recipes full of inspiration to create a whole new look and feel to your mealtimes.

title: Simon Rogan
description: Holding 5 Michelin stars, Simon Rogan is one of the most highly decorated chefs in the UK. We've teamed up with Simon and the team at L'Enclume, his 3-star award winning restaurant, to produce 9 festive fine dining recipes, curated for Thermomix®. Developed by professional chefs for the home cook, these collections are designed to showcase some of the most beautiful and delicious recipes from one of the top kitchens in the world.

title: Christmas Day
description: Eat, drink and be merry with Thermomix®! We’ve gathered some of our best recipes, from appetizers and mains to desserts and drinks, to make your meal as special as the holiday itself.

title: Christmas with Kids
description: There's nothing better than getting the kids involved at this magical time of year. This collection is brimming with ideas for festive recipes that you can make with your children. Get their help decorating the Reindeer Pear and Caramel Cupcakes, twisting the branches of the Pesto Tear and Share Christmas Tree Bread or simply selecting their favourite flavour of Hot Chocolate Stirrers.

title: Everyday Favourites
description: Packed full of flavour, these quick and easy recipes, from velvety soups to quick breads and tasty curry dishes, let Thermomix® shine.

title: Dip It or Spread It
description: We all know the feeling of filling up on a delicious dip or spread with crusty bread before the main course is served. Well, these recipes might put you in that very situation, but we promise you won't regret it. Whether you're after something sweet or savoury, hot or cold, for a party or for a romantic date night at home - there's a dip or spread for every occasion in this collection.

title: School Snacks
description: Whether you're looking for something to put in the little ones' lunchboxes or a tasty snack for when your teenagers get home after school, this collection is full of inspiration for sweet and savoury snacks, suitable for a range of ages. Get ready for the return to school with these homemade treats, many of which can be made in advance. Don't want to fill the kids up with snacks before dinner? They make great snacks for adults too!

title: Flexitarian Fusion
description: From Bibimbap Burritos to Paneer Tikka Pizzas, we've gone around the world to develop some unusual, but delicious combinations in this Flexitarian Fusion collection. Matching miso paste with a classic carbonara delivers deeply intense flavours, while combining pork katsu with a dill potato salad brings fantastic crunchy textures and zingy savouriness.

title: Platinum Jubilee
description: Whether you're celebrating the Platinum Jubilee with your family, a small group of friends, or putting up the bunting for a bustling street party, we've selected some recipes that can be made ahead to save the stress, while still producing dishes fit for a Queen. Alternatively, if you want to make your own show-stopping celebration trifle, we've included a range of basic recipes for you to get creative.

title: Go Green, Feel Good
description: We all want delicious and exciting food that is good for us as well as for the planet. This book is your guide to doing just that! These recipes have a focus on sustainable cooking, helping you cut down on food waste and celebrating the seasons. It is the perfect companion on your journey to a greener lifestyle.

title: Retro
description: Cooking and eating is all about creating memories. Take a nostalgic look back with these retro recipes of old school classics. Reminisce over TV dinners with a homemade Chicken Kiev or treat yourself to a traditional Pineapple Upside Down Cake. These recipes are sure to stir up your own memories of the good old days.

title: Community Stars Showcase Vol. 2
description: Discover a selection of delicious recipes created by members of the Thermomix® Community Stars programme. Get inspired by these delicious recipes from stars in Germany, Spain and the United Kingdom and Ireland.

title: Catch of the Day
description: Explore flavours from around the world in this collection of fish dishes inspired by a range of different cuisines. Baking them using the Rockstars stoneware collection results in wonderfully tender meat with a wonderfully crisp skin. From fish tagine to Korean-glazed cod, why not add something new to your weekly meal plan?

title: Plant-based Party
description: Eating a plant-based diet is not only good for you, but good for the planet, too! It is one of the most sustainable ways to eat and it should leave you feeling healthy and full of energy fuelled by delicious, nutritious food. Whether you're already a plant-based pro or you're just starting out, these Thermomix Friend® recipes will help you to throw the ultimate plant-based party, packed with flavour that will impress even the most passionate meat lovers.

title: Cookidoo® Served 2021
description: The only thing better than sharing a meal around the table is sharing your food milestones with family and friends. That’s why we created Cookidoo® Served 2021, an exciting new, mobile-only snapshot of your personal cooking for the year! But don’t let the fun stop there! Check out the top 10 most cooked recipes in the United Kingdom and Ireland in 2021!

title: Christmas Gifts
description: Stuck for what to get your friends and family this Christmas? Homemade gifts are a great way to show that you've put some thought into their presents. From delicate macarons to crackers and chutney, you'll find something for everyone in this collection.

title: Welcome to the World of Sous-vide
description: Sous-vide cooking has always had an air of 'chefs-only' mystery to it. Home cooks have been conditioned to think of sous-vide food as fancy, restaurant-quality dishes which we couldn't possibly recreate in our own kitchens. But with Thermomix®, you can master the art of sous-vide cooking with very little effort. You'll be dishing up impressive, perfectly cooked meat, seafood and vegetable dishes in no time at all.

title: Family Favourites
description: These family favourite recipes are made even more cosy and comforting with the addition of our Rockstars® stoneware collection! Make your favourite recipes that much more special by cooking with Ben, Paul, Anna, Betty and Kim.

title: Community Stars Showcase
description: Thermomix® created the Community Stars programme to connect with its most helpful and active customers globally and create opportunities to preview and review new recipes, products, features and services. This collection brings together some family favourites from Community Stars in Poland, Portugal and Italy.

title: Magical Marinades
description: Sometimes you have the perfect piece of meat, or lovely fresh fish, or an abundance of tasty vegetables... But you have no idea how to prepare them. In the heat of summer, the last thing any of us want to do is to slave over a hot stove or oven. But fear not, these delicious summer marinades are here to save the day. Brush them over your choice of meat, fish, vegetables or even tofu and put them onto the BBQ for an easy breezy and delicious meal in the sun!

title: Breads From Around the World
description: Bread-making is such a breeze with Thermomix so here are ten new recipes, from all over the globe, to add to your repertoire!

title: Sipping on Summer
description: The sun is beaming down, the grass is green and the ice is packed up in the freezer. It's officially the season for chilled drinks enjoyed outdoors! Whether you're after an alcoholic tipple, a decadent milkshake or a booze-free beverage, this collection has you covered.

title: Home Comforts
description: Home comforts are the items, recipes and rituals that make us feel most at ease and remind us of 'home'. These recipes, developed especially for your Rockstars stoneware, contain the cosiest, most comforting flavours and textures. From fragrant, freshly baked bread to rich meaty stews and addictively cheesy baked pasta.

title: Love at First Bite
description: Starting your weaning journey with your baby is an exciting time and with the help of your Thermomix®, it can be a truly fuss-free adventure filled with delicious food for both you and your little one. These recipes will take you through all three stages of weaning and give your baby the opportunity to explore many different flavours and textures. We want to foster a love of food in your baby from day one, and your Thermomix® is here to help you achieve that.

title: Keeping It Cosy
description: Comfort food has never been more accessible than it is with Thermomix® and your blade cover. From slowly simmered stews to vibrant, warming soups, it's all just a blade cover away. These recipes will have you feeling cosy and content in no time at all; whether you're looking for a quick weekday lunch or a lazy Sunday night dinner.

title: Flexitarian Favourites
description: From fish to chicken, from vegetarian to vegan, a flexitarian diet means enjoying a bit of everything in moderation. This collection is full of tasty recipes from around the world and they contain a range of protein choices. Try going meat-free just once or twice a week to begin with- you won't even notice there isn't any meat on your plate with these delicious alternatives.

title: Plant-based Kitchen
description: With more and more people consciously choosing to change their diet and explore the possibilities of plant-based eating, it can be challenging to think of new and interesting ways to cook plant-based foods. Plant-Based Kitchen has been created with this in mind. The focus of this collection of recipes is on tasty plant-based main courses and we have looked at food from around the world to bring you a varied offering of dishes inspired by a range of different cuisines. From Indian-spiced curries and Mexican chilli to salads, noodles, and pasta- eating plant-based has never been more exciting or accessible.

title: Thermomix Friend Welcome Booklet
description: Thermomix Friend® is here! The perfect companion for your Thermomix®, Thermomix Friend® will halve your cooking efforts but double the 'wow' factor! Cook larger portions for big family meals, create different pasta sauces simultaneously for different tastes or batch cook meals to freeze portions for another day. It's all made easy with Thermomix Friend®.

title: Everyday Basics
description: Sometimes the simplest things in life are the best things - and these recipes prove that to be true! Whether you're looking to whip up a decadently cheesy mornay sauce or a perfect batch of flapjacks, our Everyday Basics collection has it all. Plus, these recipes are ideal for experimenting with to make your own delicious variations of the classic favourites. Add blueberries to your scones, make a rich macadamia nut butter instead of peanut butter or add some citrus zest to your aioli- let your imagination run wild with Thermomix® and Cookidoo®.

title: HALLOWEEN
description: Who knew scary food could be so much fun? Startle yourself and guests with creepy treats that are sure to impress ghouls and goblins of all ages on this deliciously dark night.

title: Cooking On Point
description: From tender, slow-cooked lamb to flaky salmon and richly-spiced duck, these 10 mouth-watering recipes are absolute show-stoppers. These recipes are perfect for a languid Sunday roast, a speedy prep-ahead midweek dinner, or even a barbecue in the sun.

title: Rock On! A 'Rockstars' Stoneware Collection
description: When it comes to cooking in the Rockstars- your recipe options are endless! Paul, Betty, Ben and Anna make it easy to bake pizzas with perfectly crisp bases, to slow-cook juicy joints of meat and to bake airy cakes and decadently saucy puddings. These are some of our favourite recipes to make in our exciting stoneware range- we hope you love them, too!

title: Brilliant Baking
description: Truly brilliant baking can be tricky to achieve when it comes to complex techniques. With the launch of step videos, all of your baffling baking concerns are a thing of the past. These often-intimidating recipes now include step videos to help you during guided cooking at the trickiest parts of the recipe. Perfectly shaped croissants? We’ll show you how. Expertly piped and swirled icing? Take a look. Professionally lined quiche crusts? Easy as pie. With Thermomix and step videos, you’ll be a baking pro in no time at all.

title: Easy Cooking with Chef Dean Edwards
description: We teamed up with chef Dean Edwards to create some mouth-watering but super simple recipes that you can make at home with your Thermomix®. These recipes are all packed with diverse flavours, are economical and perfect for a multitude of occasions- from intimate dinner dates to large parties with friends and family.

title: Cookidoo Kids Picnic
description: Perfect served warm or cold, these recipes are ideal for a picnic with friends in the garden or a sunny park. Get the kids involved in the cooking, too!

title: Flavours of the Med
description: You don't have to venture abroad to taste the regional delights of Italy, Spain, Greece, Morocco and France! Bring the vibrant flavours of these countries into your home with these delicious recipes.

title: Happy Father's Day
description: Getting busy in the kitchen with dad is always fun, but it's especially fun on Father's Day! Roll up small and large sleeves alike and whip up some of these tasty recipes with the help of your Thermomix®. Whether it's an ice cream sundae enjoyed together in the garden on a sunny day or an impressive chicken dinner for the whole family, cooking with dad has never been easier or more delicious.

title: Rice Cooker Mode
description: With Rice Cooker mode, your Thermomix® replaces yet another kitchen appliance. Use these basic recipes to perfectly cook rice and other grains to serve as a side dish or mix into a salad.

title: Sizzling Summer
description: Sun, fun and buns - it must be BBQ season! It's time to get out and grill in this gorgeous sunny weather. Gather the family together and make some of these winning BBQ recipes to enjoy on lazy weekend afternoons paired with plenty of sun bathing and fun games.

title: Taste of Spring
description: The sun is shining and the skies are blue! Time to take full advantage of the gorgeous fresh produce that is so abundant during these spring months. As the weather gets warmer, nothing will hit the spot quite like the bright, refreshing flavours in these recipes.

title: Making Memories
description: With more time at home, make memories by hosting a teddy bear picnic, having a dance party or a family sports day. Try some of these recipes to help make your events even more memorable.

title: Easy Pasta
description: Pasta is a great store cupboard staple, but it’s easy to run out of ideas with it. These varied recipes should give all the midweek inspiration you need for quick-to-prepare dinners.

title: Demo Recipe Cards
description: When browsing the recipe cards in your demonstration, did you spot a recipe that you wanted to try after you got your own Thermomix®? Here, you can find all the recipes mentioned on those cards, including free-from inspiration, hearty stews and desserts to satisfy any sweet tooth.

title: Halloween Treats
description: Make Halloween truly 'spooktacular' with this collection of old favourites. From Spooky Spaghetti and Meatballs to Horror Punch and Brain Cupcakes, these treats are perfect for adding a spooky twist to any party.

title: Italian Kitchen
description: Turn your kitchen into a Mediterranean haven with pizzas, pastas and other Italian favourites from our famiglia to yours.

title: Dinner For One
description: Solo dinners don't have to mean beans on toast or frozen ready meals. Treat yourself with an extra-special dish from this single serve collection.

title: When in Rome...
description: A mouth-watering selection sure to rival your local Italian restaurant! From midweek meals to impressive dinner party recipes, from penne to homemade ravioli, for every skill level.

title: Start The Day
description: Kick off the day in the best possible way with breakfast packed full of energy and vitamins to help start the day strong.

title: Family Time
description: Make the most of this extra time with your family at home and enjoy delicious, home-cooked dinners together. Thermomix® is here to help make it easier than ever to put food on the table to gather around and share.

title: Take A Break
description: When you're in the zone working from home, it's easy to forget to stop and take a break. Make sure you re-energise yourself for the rest of the day with a good, home-cooked lunch.

title: Potatoes
description: No wonder this humble ingredient is one of the nation's favourites - it's versatile and delicious! Whether you're looking to make a salad, hearty cheesy fries or a more refined dauphinoise, there's something for everyone in this collection.

title: Vegan Comfort Food
description: This collection is perfect for those on a vegan diet who want to indulge themselves now and again. With clever dishes like tofish and chips, and twists on classics like brownies, don't miss out on the comfort these foods can bring!

title: Zero-proof Drinks
description: Whether you're the designated driver, taking part in Dry January, or simply choosing to cut down on alcohol, these non-alcoholic drinks mean that you can still enjoy a range of tasty beverages whatever the occasion.

title: Thicken Mode
description: Make a perfect sauce to serve with your meat, a smooth custard for your dessert or a curd for your tart. With Thicken mode, it's simply a case of adding your ingredients and letting Thermomix® do the hard work for you!

title: Gluten-free Christmas
description: There's no need to miss out on seasonal treats just because you're on a gluten-free diet. From dinner party canapés to a classic Christmas cake, Thermomix® has you covered this festive season.

title: Slow Cook with Blade Cover
description: Use Slow Cook mode and let Thermomix® do the hard work for you. Combine this mode with the blade cover and, with minimum fuss, serve stews with tender chunks of meat or perfectly poached fruit for a tasty dessert.

title: Sous-vide with Blade Cover
description: Using the blade cover for sous-vide cooking allows you to safely use the full capacity of the mixing bowl. Whether you're poaching eggs, or gently cooking fruit or meat, with Sous-vide mode, you'll get perfect results every time.

title: Autumn Dinners
description: This collection of comforting, easy main courses covers two weeks of weekday dinners, with most ready within 45 minutes. With a balance of meat, fish and vegetable mains, make the most of the best ingredients of the season.

title: Post-partum
description: When feeding your baby is your main concern, it’s easy to forget about looking after yourself. These recipes are not only packed full of nutrients, but they’re also easy to eat with just one hand!

title: High Temp. Basics - Vegetables
description: High Temp. mode gives flavour and colour to vegetables when sautéd or stir-fried. Make these recipes to serve as a side dish or use as the base of your own recipes.

title: No Gluten, No Problem!
description: Make eating gluten free exciting again. From pain au chocolat and pizza to an artisan loaf and homemade noodles, these sweet and savoury recipes cover breakfast, lunch and dinner as well as sweet treats.

title: High Temp. Basics - Meat and Seafood
description: Browning meat and seafood gives a wonderful depth of flavour and colour to your dishes. Use High Temp. mode in these recipes as the starting point for your own stews, casseroles and stir-fries.

title: Charity Coffee Mornings
description: Take part in a fundraising coffee morning and enjoy these delicious treats. With a great cause to support and these tasty bakes, there’s never been a better excuse to get friends together, while raising money for charity.

title: Summertime!
description: Eat the seasons with this, our summer collection. From a refreshing soup to a Pimm's jelly, you'll find ideas to help you get the most out of all the produce on offer during these warmer months.

title: Cooking with Sugar Stages
description: From Fudge to Lollipops and Salted Caramel Shortbread, with Sugar Stages mode, it couldn't be easier to make beautiful caramels for sauces, desserts and other sweet treats.

title: Frozen Fruit Smoothies
description: Refreshing summer smoothies for everyone! For the taste of summer all year round, freeze your fruit during the summer months so it’s ready to use whenever you like.

title: Hawaiian Summer
description: Experience a taste of paradise with this collection of Hawaiian-inspired recipes. A mixture of traditional Hawaiian cuisine and fusion dishes, invite your friends and family round for a tropical summer party and say aloha to the island life!

title: Meals in Minutes
description: From quick pasta dishes and curries, to speedy pies and pizzas, these recipes will show you just how easy it is to prepare delicious, home-cooked meals with Thermomix®… and all in 45 minutes or less!

title: Slow Cook and Sous-vide
description: Make the most of Slow Cooking mode with its convenience, deeper flavours and beautifully tender meat or try Sous-Vide cooking, which results in perfect, consistent results every time with improved flavours and textures.

title: Wimbledon
description: Nothing says Wimbledon like strawberries and cream. This year, why not try these summery, strawberry recipes when you're watching the tennis and make the most of this delicious, seasonal fruit?

title: Cooking with High Temp.
description: Turn up the heat with this collection of recipes that all utilise high temperature cooking mode to give the dishes more flavour, by browning meat and sautéing or caramelising vegetables.

title: High Temp. Basics - Alliums
description: Onions, shallots and garlic form part of many dishes. Get your own recipes started by sautéing, browning or caramelising them with these basic recipes using High Temp. mode.

title: Energy Balls
description: Looking to make your own energy-boosting treats? This selection of tasty, protein-packed snacks provides the perfect solution!

title: Savoury
description: From classic breads, hearty pies and exquisite tarts, to party nibbles, muffins and cheesecakes, we’re celebrating the art of savoury baking in this collection of delicious savoury recipes.

title: Butters
description: We’ve taken a basic ingredient and elevated it to new levels with exciting flavour combinations. Try a butter with Moroccan influences, Italian inspiration or a classic garlic and herb. You can even make your own butter in your Thermomix®!

title: Our Easter Menu
description: Create an extra special menu for your family Easter meal with recipes that elevate simple ingredients to make an impressive dinner. From starters and mains to side salads and desserts, these recipes have you covered!

title: Only 5 Ingredients
description: Sometimes simple is best. Except for salt and water, you only need 5 simple ingredients to try Olive and Mozzarella Farfalle for a main, serve Mint Courgettes as a side dish or treat yourself to a Cappuccino Milkshake.

title: Lower GI
description: Low GI foods raise blood sugar levels more slowly, making you feel fuller for longer. Try Breakfast Burritos, Nasi Goreng or fruity Frozen Yoghurt Bites – clever substitutions and a balance of ingredients lower the GI of these tasty recipes.

title: Celebrate Spring
description: Make the most of the freshest ingredients this spring with these quick and easy recipes. Seasonal fruit, vegetables and meat take centre stage, from Asparagus with Romesco Sauce to Minted Lamb Casserole and Rhubarb Vanilla Flan.

title: Deep South and Cajun
description: With warming recipes, like Southern Chicken and Cornbread Dressing or Mardi Gras Meatballs, and all-year-round classics, like Mississippi Mud Pie, why not give the flavours of the Deep South a try this weekend?

title: store cupboard wonders
description: Don’t know what to do with the tins sitting in the cupboard? Whether it’s the Rice Pudding Ice Cream or the Sardine and Pea Pilaf, you’ll be amazed by what you can whip up with the ingredients in your pantry.

title: under 500 calories
description: Macaroni cheese, burger and chips, and chicken pie… on a diet? If you’re looking to eat a bit healthier but still want to enjoy tasty food, this is the collection for you. 9 delicious recipes, all under 500 calories!

title: look back at 2018
description: A selection of some of the recipes from our monthly email newsletter, now available in Guided Cooking. Sign up to receive our Thermomix® newsletter for all the latest news, events and free recipes.

title: Christmas
description: Whether it’s the crispy aubergine starter, the impressive vegan roulade main or the warming apple crumble with ice cream, find inspiration for your vegetarian or vegan festive feast this Christmas.

title: mocktails
description: Add a little colour and class to your next dinner party with these alcohol-free cocktails. With something for every occasion, these delicious beverages are perfect for kids and adults alike.

title: korean cuisine
description: All the classic flavours of Korean cuisine shine through in this collection of simple recipes. With a range of popular dishes, including bibimbap, kimchi and fried chicken wings, you’ll find something for everyone.

title: Family Table
description: From breakfasts and lunchbox snacks to leisurely dinners and treats for little ones, bring your family together around the dinner table with recipes that will be loved by young and old alike.

title: tasty mexican dinners
description: This is a collection of simple recipes bursting with the traditional flavours of Mexican cooking. Choose from tacos, crêpes, enchiladas and more, and bring a bit of Mexican spice to your dinner table.

title: Meals in Under 45 Minutes
description: Even when you’re busy, you can still get a tasty, home-cooked meal on the table within 45 minutes. A simple soup, a rich risotto or a steak dinner, look no further than this collection of easy recipes.

title: Steaming
description: With Thermomix® ramekins, you can be sure that they’ll all fit perfectly in the Varoma. From pizza to cheesecake, try steaming these recipes to make the most out of yours.

title: The Basic Cookbook 2018
description: Over 170 recipes in proven Thermomix® simplicity. Delight your friends and family with deliciously tasty breads, soups, main dishes, desserts and so much more.

title: American Taste of Home
description: Whether it’s the ever popular crab cake or a classic key lime pie from the Sunshine State, this collection of recipes is the perfect way to bring a taste of the USA to your home.

title: new style asian
description: Chinese, Vietnamese, Thai, Japanese, Indonesian or Malaysian, if you’re looking for Asian inspiration, this new style Asian recipe collection is just for you!!

title: tap.cook.eat
description: From  Spanish seafood rice to American-style pizza, this is a collection of some of the most popular recipes on Cookidoo® from around the world to celebrate 1 year of Cook-Key®.

title: SOUTH AFRICAN
description: Dubbed the 'Rainbow Nation' due to its cultural diversity, South African cuisine is also uniquely diverse. With dishes such as bunny chow and milk tart, this collection of South African recipes with a twist is sure to tantalise your taste buds.

title: Portuguese Classics
description: Combining the maritime bounty of fresh fish with the robust flavours from the hills, we've created a collection of Portuguese classics to help you taste your way through Portugal.

title: Replacement Sugar
description: Have your cake and eat it too! Using ingredients like honey, coconut sugar and fruit full of natural sweetness, this collection, using alternative sugars, is bursting with flavour.

title: Greek Feast
description: Greek dishes are wholesome and fresh, simple and tasty, this collection of recipes from the sun will make you want to explore islands and relax on beaches.

title: Chinese Seafood
description: Easy to cook and brimming with oriental flavours like chilli, ginger and soy, this collection of seafood dishes will help you take on the takeaways!

title: Middle Eastern
