description: Create a homemade meze selection thanks to your Thermomix®. From Iranian Vegetable Stew and Circassian Chicken to Persian Love Cake, this collection will help you kick off your journey to the delicious Middle East.

title: World Cup Winners
description: Make a meal out of the World Cup!  This winning collection is guaranteed to please a crowd during Russia 2018.

title: Lebanese cuisine
description: From a tasty Tabbouleh to the all-time-favourite Falafel, this collection of Lebanese recipes is brimming with endless inspiration for a tantalising Middle Eastern feast.

title: Heavenly desserts
description: No meal is complete without a dessert, so indulge your friends and family with some of the delicious recipes in this collection. Be warned: they’ll be coming back for more!

title: moroccan adventure
description: Moroccan cuisine ranks as one of best in world. Whether you are lover of this cuisine already, or a complete beginner, this recipe collection is for you, it will teach you how make your very own a Ras el Hanout and flavoursome tagines in in 1 Thermomix®.

title: Super Salads
description: A collection of delicious, nutritious, colourful salads, all easily made in one Thermomix bowl!

title: Recipes for Runners
description: Whether you’re taking on a 5k or training for a full on marathon, we’ve got the recipes to fuel your fitness.

title: croatian cuisine
description: Although Croatia may be considered small in size, its culinary culture is quite diverse. Start your own tour through Croatia with these 9 delicious recipes.

title: Easter cooking
description: Fun and creative, these recipes are perfect to keep any budding chefs entertained over the bank holiday Easter weekend.

title: Cereal Bars
description: Whip up a batch of homemade cereal bars, safe in the knowledge of what goes into them. Perfect for a grab-and-go breakfast, children’s lunchbox or simply with a cup of tea or coffee.

title: A TASTE OF THE WORLD
description: Take your tastebuds on another culinary journey. Flavours of tomato, coconut, cinnamon and ginger feature heavily in this tempting collection of dishes from the East.

title: Australian Brunch
description: From a cheesy brekkie bake to a hearty aussie meat pie to get you through the arvo, this collection is a great way for you to see how Aussie's do brunch.

title: COMFORTING FAMILY FOOD
description: What could be better than a large bowl of delicious chowder or a hearty pasta dish on a cold and blustery evening? Settle in front of the fire with one of  these comforting family meals.

title: The Modern Vegetarian
description: A stunning collection of vegetarian recipes, brimming with flavour, to provide daily inspiration from breakfast to dinner.

title: Chinese new year
description: Follow our guide to creating a traditional New Year’s Eve meal. Each chosen for their symbolic meaning, such as fish to represent prosperity and dumplings to bring wealth for the year ahead, these recipes are easy with Thermomix®.

title: POCKET FRIENDLY MEALS
description: Your taste buds and wallet will achieve perfect harmony with our selection of quick meals, including speedy bassara, kale meat(less) balls and a vibrant wintergreen soup.

title: HYGGE
description: Hygge (pronounced hoo-gah) is the Danish word describing the pleasure you take in ordinary, everyday things, like comfort foods. Bring the Hygge feeling into your home with these easy Scandi style recipes.

title: LOW FAT
description: Healthy eating doesn't mean you can't enjoy delicious, filling food. These 10 tasty recipes are low on fat while big on flavour.

title: 2017 CALENDAR
description: Discover the recipes from our 2017 calendar, now available on Cookidoo®.

title: German Christmas Baking
description: Bring the magic of a German Christmas into your home with these delicious festive bakes.

title: Gifts
description: Everyone loves a homemade gift, and they’re even easier to create with your Thermomix®! There’s something here that will be just perfect for every friend or family member.

title: ENTERTAINING MADE EASY
description: Be a guest at your own party with the help of your Thermomix®. These 8 desserts will ensure the stress levels are low and but the deliciousness is high!

title: Sri Lankan Feast
description: Bring Sri Lanka to your kitchen! Laced with spices and using many local ingredients, these traditional recipes will help you discover the tastes and flavours of this beautiful island.

title: Sweet
description: The ultimate collection of sweets this book features everything from everyday cakes, to puddings, crumbles and patries. Now you too can be a master baker!

title: Soups For All Seasons
description: From a warming winter laksa to a chilled beetroot gazpacho on a hot summer day, take a culinary journey around the globe with this collection of soups for every season.

title: Comforting Stews
description: As the days get shorter and the temperatures drop, there is nothing more comforting than a hearty stew. From a sausage casserole to a vegetarian Swiss chard, chickpea and tamarind stew, there’s something for everyone with this selection of winter warmers.

title: JAPANESE CUISINE
description: From pork buns to beef teriyaki, this collection of Japanese recipes will have you saying let’s eat, or “itadakimasu”, in no time!

title: DAVID EVERITT - MATTHIAS
description: Create gourmet dishes in your own home with these 10 delicious recipes from two-Michelin-starred chef, David Everitt-Matthias.

title: ITALIAN CUISINE
description: Dolce and delizioso, Italians know that the best way to finish off a meal is with a cappuccino and a little something sweet. So indulge your senses and linger over dessert just like they do in Italia.

title: VEGAN BASICS
description: All the absolute basics, made easy with Thermomix. From cheese to granola, butters and spreads - you’ll be surprised how tasty these vegan substitutes are!

title: South American Party
description: Alfajores from Argentina, Ceviche from Peru, and Shredded Chicken from Venezuela, discover a variety of cross-cultural dishes and culinary traditions in South American cuisine.

title: VIVA MEXICO
description: Fancy hosting a Mexican party in your own home? Take inspiration from these Mexican favourites, including a take on the classic Margarita!

title: Advisor Cooking Experience
description: Advisor Cooking Experience

title: wish recipe collection
description: Wish Recipes

title: QUICK AND EASY MEALS
description: With our fast and flavoursome recipes (such as Pad Thai or lamb with pink peppercorn sauce), it's easy to create mid-week meals that please every palate - in 30 minutes or less!

title: DESSERTS
description: Nostalgic for your travels? Using ingredients from pistachios and honey to almonds and fresh fruit,  these recipes will help transport you to our favourite Mediterranean destinations.

title: Sushi
description: Sushi is seen as a delicate art form and could be intimidating to recreate. Not here! We have compiled simple yet impressive sushi recipes for you to easily prepare in your own home.

title: Patisserie
description: Developed in conjunction with 'Star maker' Chef Mick Burke, this collection of sweet treats will be sure to wow your guests.

title: SUMMER BUFFET
description: Hosting a summer party is simple with recipes that will impress your guests without keeping you in the kitchen. From creative Kale Pesto Pasta Salad to make-ahead Spinach, Tomato and Goat's Cheese Quiche, these dishes were made for special occasions.

title: ALLERGEN FRIENDLY
description: When living with food allergies, a good range of allergy friendly recipes is a necessity because you'll be cooking from scratch more often.  Whether you're trying to avoid, gluten, eggs, lactose, fish, soy or meat, this collection has something for you!

title: South African
description: A braai is part of South African culture and provides an excuse for a social gathering of friends and family around an open fire. Find inspiration for your own barbecue with these creative and traditional recipes.

title: SALAD DRESSINGS
description: Ditch the shop-bought bottles and give your salads a boost with a homemade dressing. From classic Caesar dressing to a lime fruit dressing, savoury or sweet we've got you covered.

title: American Classics
description: When we think of American classics our minds jump to comfort food: pizza, fish tacos, cream pies and waffles. Here are some of our all-time favourites perfect for your 4th of July celebrations.

title: ALL IN ONE FAMILY MEALS
description: Using your Varoma, it's easy to create impressive, multi-layer meals for the whole family, including favourites such as slow-cooked pulled pork or Asian-style soups.

title: Peaches & Nectarines
description: There’s nothing quite like getting a peach or nectarine when it’s perfectly ripe and in season…these recipes will give you plenty of new ideas on how to use them.

title: Summer Berries
description: There are few things sweeter about the summer than its beautiful seasonal berries. Ten recipes to see you through dinner parties, everyday treats and family-friendly desserts.

title: persian vegetarian
description: With a dynamic history and diverse culture, Ancient Persia has always had the best of the seasons which hugely influenced its cuisine and these flavours lend themselves very well to vegetarian meals as seen in these 10 delicious recipes.

title: Great Taste On Every Level
description: Delicious all in one recipes from around the globe. The recipes in this cookbook use the Thermomix in its entirety, perfect for everyday cooking.

title: Moroccan Flavours
description: Sample the aromatic and spicy food of North Africa by taking your taste-buds on a trip to Morocco. A vibrant country with an array of delicious sweet and savoury dishes, we've included a few recipes to start your culinary journey around the world.

title: Grain Free Bread
description: With this collection of paleo-friendly breads and pastries, you'll never miss out on sandwiches, wraps or tarts again!

title: ALTERNATIVE SIDES
description: A great side dish can be the show stopper to any main. From Coconut Creamed Kale to Spicy Cornbread Gratin these recipes are sure to wow your family & guests.

title: Vegetarian Cooking
description: Sliders, Bolognaise, savoury pies… veggies have never tasted so good, thanks to our meat-free twists on classic family favourites.

title: Marinades
description: Spice up your summer time meals with a delicious marinade and excite your taste-buds with a quick and simple sauce. Sauces and marinades for every occasion.

title: Gluten Free
description: Bread rolls, flour, cakes and more - let Thermomix take the guess work out of gluten free baking with a full range of sweet and savoury recipes.

title: SNACKS ON THE MOVE!
description: In the rush of life we sometimes find ourselves beating back the cravings between meals. Snack smarter with these quick easy options, sure to tide you over until your next meal.

title: Plant Based Eating
description: There’s no doubt that reducing your meat intake is one of the best things you can do for your health and the environment. These delicious recipes will help you embrace plant-based eating.

title: Everything Easter
description: Traditional Easter dishes from around the world. Torta Pasqualina from Italy, Cyprian cheese tarts (Flaounes) and British asparagus and hollandaise tart., this collection has something for everyone.

title: A Taste of India
description: Making your own Indian cuisine doesn’t need to be complicated when you have a Thermomix! Here is everything you need to create your own Indian feast at home!

title: Vegetable Sweet Bakes
description: Why keep vegetables only for savoury dishes? Whether you’re looking to get your kids to eat more veggies or simply after more baking inspiration, well these recipes are a good starting point.

title: DANIA Z DROBIU
description: Uweilbiamy mięso drobiowe - kruche, soczyste I delikatne. Proponujemy wersje klasyczne, ale pozwalamy także przełamać nudę w kuchni. Maroko Tajlandia a może Indie? Wszystkie mogą stanowić pyszny pomysł nie tylko na obiad.

title: Breakfast Bowls
description: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, yet with the fast pace of life it is often skipped. Here are 10 nutritious recipes to inspire you to kick-start your day the best way possible and keep you energised until lunch.

title: WHOLEFOOD COOKING
description: From a superfood salmon salad to melt-in-your-mouth raw chocolate, each recipe in this collection is designed to nourish your body and soul with wholesome, nutritious ingredients.

title: Chinese
description: It’s healthier and more economical than takeaway…and tastes better made in your Thermomix! Starters, mains and side dishes to create your own Chinese banquet at home.

title: Weekend Brunch
description: Can you think of a better way to celebrate the weekend than with a long, lazy brunch? Neither can we. Here are our 10 favourite sweet and savoury ways to start the day.

title: WHITE FISH
description: High in protein, vitamins and omega-3 fatty acids, low in fat - we all know we need to include more white fish in our diets. Here are 10 delicious ideas to try!

title: Yoghurt
description: Another thing you won’t need to buy from the shop anymore! With a Thermomix it’s easy to make your own yoghurt – in a whole array of flavours.

title: Thermomix Favourites
description: A collection of tried and true Thermomix favourites, as voted by you! From a simple Ricotta to an All-in-one 'roast', here are your top 10 favourite recipes.

title: Budget Friendly Italian
description: From a rustic Tuscan bean soup to a decadent berry jam tart, this collection delivers affordable meals featuring all of the robust flavours of Italy.

title: Sugar Free
description: Whether you need to cut out sugar for medical reasons or simply want to reduce the amount of refined sugar in your diet, these recipes prove that no sugar doesn’t mean no flavour!

title: Tasty Flatbreads
description: Perfect for any meal, these versatile flatbreads are great for sharing and simple to make.

title: BABY FOOD II
description: Because we like to include ALL the family in our meal planning! Another collection of first foods for baby, sweet and savoury, so you know exactly what’s going into their meals.

title: Meat-free
description: Whether you follow a vegetarian diet or just like to have the option of some meat-free meals during the week, these recipes will have every meal and mood covered.

title: Oranges
description: Make use of this beautifully vibrant citrus fruit while it’s in season…it’s not just for sweet dishes!

title: Quinoa
description: Love using super foods but running out of ideas how to? This collection will help you incorporate quinoa from breakfast to dinner, with some snacks along the way!

title: Steam Supreme
description: Are you making the most of your Varoma? With a meal here for everyone – and even some desserts – you'd never guess these dishes were steamed!

title: Canapes
description: Friends coming round for drinks? Need some nibbles before a special meal? Entertaining is so much easier with your Thermomix! Hot, cold, meat and veggie - all you need is here.

title: Dining in with Friends
description: ‘Tis the season for dinner parties! This collection has everything you need for your entertaining needs, from snacks and starters through to sensational desserts.

title: Christmas Around the World
description: Looking for something a bit different this Christmas? We’ve taken inspiration from around the world to bring you the best international classics to add to your repertoire.

title: Thermomix Like a Chef
description: We’ve teamed up with Madalene Bonvini-Hamel of The British Larder to give you an extra-special menu of chef-quality meals you can make in your Thermomix.

title: Cocktails
description: Great entertaining is about being relaxed…which is why your Thermomix® can really help you! Colourful cocktails created in minutes, these drinks will make your party sparkle.

title: Baked Chicken
description: Open your taste buds to the flavours of the Mediterranean! Full of colourful and fresh ingredients, every recipe in this collection is a crowd-pleaser for both friends and family.

title: PEARS
description: Cousin of the apple, this autumn treat is so versatile it warrants its own collection! It works in both savoury and sweet dishes, and there’s a recipe in here for everyone.

title: Pumpkin
description: Nothing says autumn’s arrived quite like pumpkins appearing everywhere. These seasonal recipes will help you make the most of them!

title: Vegan
description: Vegan lifestyle? Then we have just the recipes for you! These hearty main meals will soon become firm favourites for you and your family – and there are some sweet treats too!

title: More Midweek Meals
description: The much anticipated follow up to our bestselling MIDWEEK MEALS! Ten more flavourful, fast dishes. When you’re short of time, Thermomix gets your dinner on the table in minutes!

title: 10 EASY SALMON  DINNERS
description: 10 new reasons to serve salmon! (If you needed more - protein, vitamins, minerals and omega-3 fatty acids). These are recipes you can trust for a quick and tasty family dinner.

title: ONE POT CHICKEN
description: These ten easy chicken meals are full of flavour but low on effort level…everything goes in the mixing bowl and your Thermomix takes care of the rest. Dinner in minutes!

title: Add Some Sauce!
description: For pasta, meats, for dipping, as an accompaniment…from Asia to Great Britain via France and Italy…you’ll never need to buy a jar of sauce again!

title: Layer Cakes
description: These super impressive party cakes will have you showered with compliments! Reliable recipes, and a flavour for every special occasion.

title: Salads
description: The days are getting warmer and that calls for lighter, fresher meals. These delicious salads cover all bases – meat, fish, seafood, vegetarian, gluten-free, pasta and grain based…

title: Sports Nutrition
description: Whether you’re after some pre-workout fuel or something to help you recover, this collection has been formulated to help you get the most out of whatever exercise you do.

title: Summer Cocktails
description: Jugs of colourful and refreshing cocktails to welcome your guests to any occasion – BBQ, party or picnic! Including twists on a few classics as well as some sparkling new ideas.

title: SEAFOOD
description: An eclectic mix of dishes comprising soups, lunches and main meals – featuring all your favourites from the sea – including crab, calamari, salmon, mussels, and many more!

title: Everyday Cakes
description: Love baking but don’t always have the time? These simple recipes are super-quick to prepare…not that anyone would ever know – they have sublime results!

title: Party Time!
description: Everyone loves a party! Here is everything you need to make some really fun dishes for a kids’ party that children will love – including drinks and sweet treats.

title: Chicken
description: Low in fat, high in protein – chicken is a favourite ingredient for many. This variety of recipes shows just how versatile it is – use this popular meat in meals for every occasion.

title: Breakfast Smoothies
description: When your morning schedule is packed, a power breakfast smoothie is the answer! A nutritious start to the day, to power you through – or use as a mid-morning snack to refuel.

title: Under 400 Calories
description: We’ve calculated the calories, all you need to do is enjoy them. These ten healthy, balanced meals – including desserts – all weigh in under 400 calories.

title: Barbecue
description: The sun is shining, get those BBQs out! We’ve got something for all your outdoor eating needs – from burgers and ribs to something a bit more special…and all the sides and sauces!

title: Just for Two
description: From starters, through a variety of mains, to some really special treats to round your meal off – dinner for two is made really easy with Thermomix®!

title: GLUTEN FREE
description: We know there’s nothing worse than flavourless, cardboard-like gluten-free options. These are delicious staple recipes that you wouldn’t even know are for a special diet.

title: Rhubarb
description: It’s only in season for a few months…Give your dishes a blast of glorious, vibrant pink – use it in everything from jams to drinks, cakes and desserts!

title: Thai Kitchen
description: You don’t need takeaway menus when you own a Thermomix®… from the classic Pad Thai to some more unusual Thai flavours, including starters, curries and salads.

title: Milkshakes
description: Dessert through a straw, created in minutes! Your children will definitely want to finish their dinner when they know the treats to come afterwards. Great for parties, too!

title: Everyday Paleo
description: Developed with nutritionist Jenny Tschiesche, these nutritious and delicious recipes include everything you need to get started with paleo eating, from the basics to complete meals.

title: SPRINGTIME SOUPS
description: Love making soup but bored of making the same old classics? We’ve compiled a healthy, wholesome selection of seasonal recipes for you to add to your repertoire.

title: Creative Kids' Food
description: If your children are keen little chefs, they’ll love helping you with these recipes! From mice, dogs and worms to lollies, we’ve got lunch, dinner, dessert and snack ideas.

title: Easy detox juices
description: Take a positive step towards health and wellbeing - nutritional advice on each recipe will help you choose the best detox juice, and Thermomix will have it ready to drink freshly pressed, and full of goodness.

title: PANCAKES
description: Sweet, savoury…breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack…veggie, meat-filled…quick snack or main meal…from rather healthy to a bit of a treat…get flipping with our selection of pancakes!

title: HOMEMADE JUICE
description: There can be so many hidden nasties in shop-bought juices…know exactly what’s going in your juice with these recipes, and let Thermomix prepare them in seconds!

title: Raw
description: Whether on a special diet or just wanting to eat clean, this selection developed with Kate Magic are proof that raw food can make substantial meals that are full of flavour.

title: Detox!
description: Feel you’ve overindulged over the festive period? Give yourself a fresh start with these clean eats. Replenish your vitamin supplies and get yourself back on track in no time!

title: WINTER COCKTAILS
description: Not shaken, not stirred…Thermomixed! ‘Tis the season for entertaining, so we’ve got a cocktail of different flavours and spirits, especially for the colder months.

title: The British Isles on a Plate
description: A varied collection of traditional recipes and those with a slight twist, from all over the British Isles, helping you create these traditional, homely favourites in your kitchen.

title: Merry Christmas!
description: Your Christmas kitchen survival guide! A whole host of Christmas goodies, whether you need a helping hand with the main meal, or are looking for some festive baking inspiration.

title: COOKING FOR A  CROWD
description: Whether you have friends coming for dinner or family descending for the weekend, these are delicious meals that will serve 6-8 – covering lunch, dinner and dessert.

title: Indian Feast
description: We heard you – you’d much rather make your own Indian than order takeaway. This is our second selection of our most inspirational recipes for you to create the ultimate night in.

title: Cookies & Biscuits
description: The ultimate collection: crunchy, chewy, fruity, chocolatey…for adults, for children…for afternoon tea, for dunking, for snacking, for parties!

title: AUTUMNAL SOUPS
description: The leaves are turning, there’s a chill in the air...we’re celebrating the new season with our most warming, heartiest, nutritious and satisfying soups. Perfect for office lunches.

title: The Apple of My Eye
description: The most tempting apple-based sweet things we could find! From sponges to pastries, to panna cotta and pudding, these recipes are sure to transform your idea of the British apple.

title: LUNCHBOX INSPIRATION
description: No more soggy sandwiches or boring pre-packed snacks with our satisfying, nutritious lunches on the go! Made in minutes or seconds, these are creative yet easy.

title: A Taste of the Med
description: A selection of Mediterranean-inspired main courses, snacks and desserts guaranteed to instantly transport you to balmy summer evenings by the sea…

title: Risotto
description: Your Thermomix® is the very best risotto chef! Featuring meat, seafood and colourful vegetables, these are far more extraordinary – and impressive – than your average risotto dish.

title: Bread
description: Whether a regular breadmaker looking for new inspiration, or yet to discover Thermomix’s knead function, you’ll never buy shop-bought bread again with this delicious selection.

title: Green Eats
description: Whether on a vegetarian diet, or just know you need to eat more of those healthy, cost-effective, delicious veggies, this collection provides a selection of lunch and dinner recipes as varied as your veg box!

title: All-in-one Meals
description: Do you need to start making use of all your Thermomix parts? Do you want to save time with multi-layer cooking? These impressive recipes are easy to prepare and taste divine.

title: Dips and Spreads
description: Whether you’re preparing a picnic or packed lunch, or you’ve got friends coming round for drinks and need to provide some nibbles – you can whizz most of these up in seconds.

title: Welcome Collection
description: A selection of our absolute favourites to get you started, and to help you create entire meals, with your brand new Thermomix!

title: BABY FOOD
description: Want to know exactly what’s going in your baby’s food? A varied collection, from wholesome first foods to tasty lumpier dishes, all created in minutes – or seconds!

title: BREAKFAST
description: Good morning! Wake up that Thermomix so it can help you start the day the right way, with this nutritious selection of recipes for on-the-go snacks or a leisurely weekend brunch.

title: PERFECT PRESERVES
description: From classic jams to more unusual flavour combinations, there’s a jar of sweetness for every season. And with Thermomix you don’t have to worry about the stirring or burnt saucepans!

title: Refresh & Revitalize
description: Get ready to reset after the holidays. Our Refresh and Revitalize recipes are full of the vitamins and nutrients your body needs to get back on track for a healthier start to the new year. Our Steamed Cod over Greens, Green Shakshuka, Green Smoothie and Green Goddess Salad focus on nutrient-dense foods, lean protein, and fresh produce to help your body perform, naturally detox, and get you ready to tackle the New Year!

title: Fabulous 50+ CA
description: This collection is designed for seasoned women, offering recipes that support well-being and vitality. Featuring nutrient-rich ingredients, these dishes promote energy and health, helping you age with grace and embrace this stage of life with every meal.

title: Must Have Accessories - CA
description: Cook efficiently and with less effort while taking multi-tasking to the next level with these must have accessories. Get ready to cook on point and unleash precision in your kitchen with Thermomix® Sensor. A second bowl is essential to whipping perfect egg whites, keeping soup warm and letting dough rise without slowing down recipe preparation. The 2-in-1 blade cover not only protects ingredients while cooking; it also peels your vegetables while preserving all the flavor, color, and nutritional content of foods during slow and sous-vide cooking. Thermomix® Trolley goes where you go with room for all your accessories, so you never have to manage without them.

title: Chicken Soups - CA
description: There is nothing better than a warm bowl of chicken soup; nourishing, brothy, cozy and soothing. These recipes are packed with so many healing, anti-inflammatory ingredients they will kick up your immune system and get you back on your feet in no time. Perfect for flu season and all year long!

title: Recipes for Diabetics - CA
description: See our full collection of the simple, tasty recipes from Thermomix® Cooking for Diabetes. These recipes deliver flavor and nutrition and provide a healthy way to cook and eat that everyone can enjoy.

title: Flu and Cold Busters
description: While home remedies cannot cure a cold or the flu, they can help relieve symptoms during your recovery. Our Flu and Cold Busters are full of superfoods to help you manage your symptoms — such as body aches, fever, chills, and nasal congestion. Battle your cold or flu with the power of ginger, turmeric, oranges, and honey.

title: Diamond Club CA - 1st edition
description: The Diamond Club is our most elite circle of Thermomix® consultants, recognized for their performance, dedication, and expertise. To celebrate their achievements in this inaugural edition, we’ve curated a collection of their favorite Cookidoo® recipes—the go-to dishes they love to prepare and share. These recipes are the ones they trust, love, recommend, and return to time and again. We’re honored to celebrate the excellence of these remarkable individuals through this first-ever collection of their personal favorites.

title: Cookidoo®  Served 2024
description: It's the return of Cookidoo® Served! Featuring Canada's favourite 10 recipes from 2024. Visit the Cookidoo® app on your phone to discover facts and figures about your year in cooking with Thermomix®.

title: Halloween - Deliciously Scary!
description: Who knew scary food could be so much fun? Startle yourself and guests with creepy treats that are sure to impress ghouls and goblins of all ages on this deliciously dark night.

title: ROARlando Faves
description: Get a taste of ROARlando, our annual Thermomix® conference in Orlando, with our exclusive recipe collection! Featuring Brazilian Limeade, Strawberry Lemonade Mimosa, Whole Orange Bundt Cake, and Orange Julius, these recipes wow our talented salesforce and showcase the magic of Thermomix®. Bring a taste of ROARlando home!

title: Summer BBQ
description: Get ready to host the ultimate cookout with our BBQ recipe collection. From comforting mac and cheese to traditional sides, these time-honored recipes are sure to be crowd-pleasers, bringing the taste of the BBQ to your backyard gathering

title: Gluten Free - CA
description: Banana Bread, rolls, flour and more, simple everyday baking recipes that will raise the bar on gluten free cooking. These delicious and satisfying recipes will more than stand up to their glutinous counterparts.

title: Taco Bar Staples
description: Celebrate Taco Tuesday every week with Thermomix®. Everything from shredding lettuce, grating cheese, cooking beef and blending your spices and toppings. Take your taco bar to the next level with these tasty toppings, fillings, and sides.

title: Waffles - Canada
description: Searching for a twist on a classic breakfast food? From savory Loaded Potato Waffles to Red Velvet or Brownie Waffles and everything in between, we have the waffle for you. It’s the ultimate mash-up. Grab your waffle iron and get started on making some deliciously unique waffles.

title: Breads - Thermomix® Sensor
description: What could be better than a slice of warm and fluffy homemade bread? Comforting and tasty fresh out of the oven and baked to perfection with Thermomix® Sensor.

title: Desserts - Thermomix® Sensor
description: Turn a guess into success with Thermomix® Sensor. Cook with confidence and reach baking perfection and never be intimated by baking again.

title: Proteins - Thermomix® Sensor
description: Turn a guess into success. Thermomix® Sensor helps you cook the juiciest steaks, chicken, turkey, fish and other meats perfectly every time.

title: Happy Easter!
description: Hop on these easy Easter ideas that anyone of any cooking level can whip up for a festive feast. Take your holiday celebration to the next level with tender, juicy Sous-Vide Lamb Chops with Mint Sauce, scrumptious Hot Cross Buns, Chocolate Eggs, Easter cookies and more.

title: Gut Health
description: Help support your microbiome and overall health with recipes that contain gut-friendly ingredients (kefir, leafy greens, high-fiber swaps, fermented foods and a variety of vegetables). These recipes will balance your gut and keep you feeling great!

title: Consultant Favourites - Cookie Exchange
description: Preheat your ovens and get ready to spread some holiday cheer! Our creative Independent Consultants have submitted their favourite cookie recipes right in time for the festive baking season. We are pleased to share these treats with you to add fun new flavours to your holiday tables.

title: Consultant Favourites - Cookie Exchange 2
description: Preheat your ovens and get ready to spread some holiday cheer! Our creative Independent Consultants have submitted their favourite cookie recipes right in time for the festive baking season. We are pleased to share these treats with you to add fun new flavours to your holiday tables.

title: Artisan Bread
description: From rustic sourdough bread to pull apart dinner rolls or bannock bread, making bread at home can be a deeply rewarding journey. The secret to good bread is knowing how to wait. Wait for the yeast to form, the dough to rise and for the crust to become crispy in the oven. With the ease of Thermomix®...creating a delicious soft, tender crumb or a crisp, chewy crust with those signature soft holes are just a bake away.

title: Cooking Experience 烹饪体验
description: 无论您是独立顾问，顾客还是大厨，这些食谱都可以帮助您快速上手，熟悉美善品®的基础功能。从饮料到甜点，随意搭配，定制您的专属菜单。

title: Low Carb Thanksgiving
description: Keep on track during the holiday season with these low carb recipes that will rival any classic favourites. From low carb stuffing to sugar free pecan tarts, these low carb recipes are so delicious, even non low carb diners will be delighted with your spread.

title: TM Basics - Stocks & Pastes
description: Add depth of flavour and nutritional goodness to soups and sauces with homemade stocks and pastes, made easy with Thermomix®. Save this handy collection for quick reference and use in your favourite savoury recipes.

title: TM Basics - Condiments
description: A well-stocked pantry allows you to whip up meals quickly. Make your own mayonnaise, butter, sauerkraut and so much more from scratch and fill your pantry with real food staples. Use these basic, versatile ingredients frequently to save time and money.

title: TM Basics - Salad Dressings
description: Dressings are essential to the success of your salads! Keep a supply of delicious homemade vinaigrettes on hand and you'll be ready to give your dishes an extra kick of flavour. From Lemony Apple cider Vinaigrette to Caesar or Blue Cheese dressing, it's all up to you depending on the mood of the day!

title: O Canada
description: Taste Canada’s diverse landscape coast to coast. Whether whipping up our iconic Canadian Strawberry Shortcake or celebrating an age-old Quebecois tradition by preserving your garden herbs in salt you are sure to experience our distinct regional favourites that offer the warmth and comfort of home made effortlessly with Thermomix®.

title: Smart Grilling with Thermomix® and MEATER® (Metric)
description: Whether you’re a seasoned grill master or a beginner who wants to enjoy the smoky flavors of fresh-grilled meat and fish, the combined power of Thermomix® and MEATER®+ takes the guesswork out of grilling.

title: TM Basics - Blade Cover & Peeler Metric
description: The Thermomix® Blade Cover & Peeler is the 2-in-1 accessory for the Thermomix® TM6™ and TM5 that will take your cooking to the next level. Clean, scrub and peel vegetables without the mess or fuss at the touch of a button. Master the art of slow and sous-vide cooking to preserve all the flavour, colour and nutritional content of foods. The Thermomix®  Blade Cover & Peeler will help you do all this with minimal effort.

title: Dynamic Duo - Second Bowl Advantage
description: You already know how much time and money you save with Thermomix - imagine what you can do with a second bowl! Whip egg whites or meringue without stopping to clean the bowl. Grind almonds for flour, sugar to icing sugar or Parmesan cheese without stopping the flow of your recipe. Get out of the kitchen faster with the ease of a second bowl.

title: Everyday Traditions - Jewish Favourites
description: Whether you're planning a menu for Chanukkah or craving a warm, comforting bowl of matzo ball soup, these everyday dishes are must have recipes your whole family will love. From a juicy Holiday Brisket to a delicious jelly-filled Sufganiyot, there is no better way to connect to previous generations then through food.

title: Sugar Shack
description: It's sugaring season! Experience the gourmet pleasures of the sugar bush and recreate a traditional Quebec sugar shack meal at home with these emblematic recipes.  Ideal to complement a brunch, a lunch, or to have a sweet treat with your family.

title: Harvest Celebration
description: Thermomix® has you covered on all your Thanksgiving dinner recipes from turkey to sides—and of course, pumpkin pie! We have everything you need for a delicious harvest celebration!

title: Perfect for Dipping
description: These dips pop with flavour are delightfully satisfying and pair well with everything from chips and crackers to crudités and crostini. Whether you’re looking for an after-school treat, a party dip for a family game night, or a lunch time snack, you can’t go wrong with these healthy and fabulous dips.

title: Keep it Cool!
description: Keep it cool with the Thermomix® white serving bowl and ice cream scoop. These versatile recipes take full advantage of this double walled stainless steel insulated dish. From ice cream to salads, this elegant white serving bowl is designed to go from refrigerator to freezer to table and keep it chilled until you're ready to serve - it just might be the perfect serving bowl.

title: Road Trip - Travelling with Thermomix
description: Dreaming about your next trip or vacation? Don't forget your Thermomix®! PERFECT for Airbnb, Vrbo, camping, caravanning, cruising and more.

title: Everything Maple
description: Discover the sweet secret to adding complex flavours to a limitless range of dishes. From breakfast to dinner, pure Maple syrup highlights and intensifies flavours in both sweet and savoury dishes. What could be better than the taste of maple to sweeten up your spring.

title: Fresh Baked Baguettes
description: These beautiful baguettes pair perfectly with your holiday appetizers or a weeknight meal. Light, crispy, chewy loaves and golden crusts add a homemade touch to any meal. Try our festive baguette for a nutritious boost of spinach or super greens for a flavourful twist.

title: Smart Cooking with Thermomix® and Hestan Cue™
description: Smart Cooking technology delivers remarkable control with superior cooking precision. Thermomix® and Hestan Cue™ brings this latest technology into your kitchen. Together we guide you step-by-step to perfectly cooked dishes.

title: Cookalong Lunch
description: Grâce à Thermomix®, vous pouvez cuisiner en compagnie des chefs cuisiniers célèbres Bill Yosses, Shola Olunloyo et Lynette MacDonald pendant que nous vous guidons à préparer leurs recettes préférées d’automne.

title: The basic cookbook
description: Get to know Thermomix® and explore an easier way of cooking. You'll soon be returning to these useful tips and simple recipes on a daily basis for successful home-cooked meals.

title: CA Digital Flipbook
description: As a unique, extremely versatile kitchen appliance, we believe a cooking experience is the best and only way to see the Thermomix® in action. It gives you the chance to try it out, taste the delicious results and see how it fits into your kitchen. These recipes will help you make an impressionable demonstration.

title: Cafe-style muffins
description: Who doesn't love those mouth watering muffins your see in cafes, loaded with deliciousness just waiting for you to take a bite, but the price is stopping you! Well now you can easily make them at home without the price tag.

title: Chef favourites (part 2)
description: Featuring many of our most-loved recipes from chefs around Australia and New Zealand, this collection will see you unleash your inner chef in the comfort of your own home. We’ll be adding new recipes regularly – so stay tuned!

title: High Protein
description: This is the high-protein recipe collection that makes healthy eating delicious. Whether you're building muscle, boosting energy, or just staying full longer, these flavor-packed dishes have you covered. From quick snacks to hearty meals, eat strong to stay strong!

title: New year weeknights
description: With the new year underway, everyone is looking for quick and easy meals for those busy days. This collection offers a variety of midweek dinner recipes that are perfect for keeping in your regular rotation – ideal for those weeks when you need to get a delicious meal on the table without the hassle.

title: Lunchbox ideas
description: Stuck for ideas? Let us help! Inventive and delicious, we have lunchbox recipes for both kids and adults, including wraps, no-bake slices and chocolate treats (with a healthy twist).

title: Health boost challenge
description: Boost your wellness with these plant-packed recipes inspired by the Mediterranean Diet. It's healthy made delicious.

title: Spiralize your life (TM6)
description: Give your vegetables a twist with the new accessory for your Thermomix®. If you are one of those who always go for pasta, there is an alternative that has become increasingly popular in the gastronomic world. A plate of zoodles has less than a quarter of the calories. The best thing is that they are easy to prepare and ideal with any kind of sauce. You'll forget that the main ingredient is vegetables!

title: Spiralize your life (TM5)
description: Give your vegetables a twist with the new accessory for your Thermomix®. If you are one of those who always go for pasta, there is an alternative that has become increasingly popular in the gastronomic world. A plate of zoodles has less than a quarter of the calories. The best thing is that they are easy to prepare and ideal with any kind of sauce. You'll forget that the main ingredient is vegetables!

title: Savoury Christmas
description: Good tidings and good food wrapped up for Christmas. Recipes with easy entertaining in mind, sure to impress all.

title: Sweet Christmas
description: The perfect end to a Christmas feast, a sweet treat or sweet gift. It is not Christmas without a little sugar and spice.

title: Pickles with Thermomix®️ Cutter
description: Who doesn't love a good pickle in their burger or salad or adding them to your cheese board, which ever way you like your pickles, we have made it easy for you to make them with this collection and your Thermomix®️ Cutter.

title: Pickles with Thermomix®️ Cutter (TM6)
description: Who doesn't love a good pickle in their burger or salad or adding them to your cheese board, which ever way you like your pickles, we have made it easy for you to make them with this collection and your Thermomix®️ Cutter.

title: Batch cooking
description: If you like to plan and prep ahead for the weeks to come, then our Batch cooking collection is exactly what you need. Cook up a storm with our basic recipes and them use them with the suggested recipes we have in the collection or make them into your own dishes that your family and friends love. Which ever way you go, your freezer will be stocked and ready.

title: The Best of Recipe Community
description: Your favourite recipes from our Thermomix® Recipe Community, right here on Cookidoo®. From banana bread, to cookies, breads and mains – enjoy it all in Guided Cooking.

title: Kaiser rolls
description: Everything you need to make your own Kaiser rolls, from the Barley malt powder to traditional Kaiser rolls to Kaiser rolls filled with chicken.

title: Thermomix® Everyday Summer 2024/2025
description: All our Thermomix® Everyday Summer 2024/2025 magazine recipes in one collection ready for you to enjoy and cook. From our delicious cover recipe that everyone is making to weeknight recipes to recipes from the Mediterranean Diet for those looking for a healthy start to the year, we have got you covered with this collection.

title: Homemade noodles and dumplings
description: Create homemade noodles and dumplings from scratch to add to any dish. Have them at the ready to use in so many dishes whether it be ramen, soups or stir fry. Just the satisfaction of creating your own should excite anyone into trying this collection.

title: Thermomix® Cooking for Diabetes
description: See our full collection of the simple, tasty recipes from our cookbook, Thermomix® Cooking for Diabetes. Triple tested and designed in line with the nutritional guidelines from Diabetes Australia, these are recipes everyone can enjoy and create.

title: Mocktails
description: Looking for a cocktail, but without the alcohol. Well this is the collection for you. Delicious mocktails that will suit any occasion, that everyone can enjoy from adults to the kids.

title: Homemade Gifts
description: Finding the perfect present just got a lot easier! Find inspiration for both sweet and savoury gourmet gifts (and a few options just for adults) to delight your family and friends.

title: Hot cross buns
description: A bun for everyone! This creative collection has got everyone's taste buds in mind from savoury to sweet and everything in between.

title: Chaos cooking
description: Dive into Chaos Cooking—a kitchen adventure where you blend ingredients for delightful surprises. Create Smash burger tacos or Buffalo chicken spring rolls, turning your fridge into a flavour playground. Unleash your creativity and savour the excitement of tasty chaos!

title: Sam Wood
description: Thermomix® and Sam Wood have collaborated to convert his most popular recipes from his 28 day program. Try some of these amazing tasty and healthy recipes.

title: Thermomix® Everyday Winter 2024
description: All our Thermomix®️ Everyday winter magazine recipes in one collection ready for you to enjoy and cook. Make the most of the seasonal produce with our seasonal recipes or cook up a storm with our batch cooking recipes ready for the weeks head. With all these winter warms you are set for the winter season.

title: Pastry
description: If it is pastry you need then it is pastry we have got, from sweet pastry to savoury, from wholemeal to short crust to gluten free we have them all in this collection.

title: Fakeaway favourites
description: Create some of your family’s favourite takeaway meals at home using the High Temp mode on your TM6. Tacos, fajitas, gyros, even Kung Pao chicken - Friday night never tasted so good!

title: Darren Robertson
description: From savoury to sweet, chef Darren Robertson's recipes champion natural flavours whilst using as much of the whole ingredient as you can and with a bit of pre-prep can easily be made at home.

title: Nice bundt
description: These gorgeously shaped Bundts are a worthy centrepiece for any occasion. A collection of delicious flavours, every one is a showstopper.

title: Flavours of Japan
description: Welcome to the art of Japanese cooking. Unique, seasonal, fresh, with strong ties to a traditional culture. Detailed in preparation and presentation prepare to let your taste buds travel.

title: Thermomix® Sensor (Getting started)
description: Turn a guess into success with Thermomix® Sensor. For everything from cakes, to breads, meat, poultry and fish. Thermomix® Sensor talks to your TM6, to tell you when the perfect level of done-ness is achieved, so you get restaurant-quality results every time.

title: Thermomix® Sensor (Bread, cakes and more)
description: Turn a guess into success with Thermomix® Sensor. This collection has you covered for your baking needs with bread, cakes and much more. Thermomix® Sensor talks to your TM6, to tell you when the perfect level of done-ness is achieved, so you get success every time.

title: Postcards from Greece
description: Opa! From Prawn saganaki to tsoureki (Greek Easter bread), look no further than these traditional Greek recipes for a little Hellenic inspiration.

title: French cuisine: Desserts
description: From delicate Almond tuiles to a traditional Cherry clafoutis, this collection features a superb range of desserts from the country famous for their decadent sweet treats.

title: Indonesian

title: Beat the heat

title: Get Thermomix® Fit with Noni

You’ll find 7 days of breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks for 1 to 2 people – a ‘taster’ of full Noni’s 6-week challenge (www.thermofit.com.au).

description: Whether it’s a morning tea or an after dinner decadence, this collection of six traditional Polish desserts has something sweet for everyone.

title: Italian cuisine: Desserts
description: Dolce and delizioso, Italians know that the best way to finish off a meal is with a cappuccino and a little something sweet. So indulge your senses and linger over dessert just like they do in Italia.

title: Focus on Feijoas
description: Whip yourself into a feijoa frenzy with our sweet and savoury creations. From preserving to baking to mid-week meals, make the most of this amazing fruit before the season ends!

title: Shane Delia's Spice Journey
description: Join award-winning chef and TV presenter Shane Delia on a journey through the Middle East with a few of his favourite recipes from his best-selling cookbook, Spice Journey.

title: Moroccan street food
description: With Moorish, Arab and Mediterranean influences, Moroccan food is known for its creative flavour combinations. Exotic ingredients and aromatic spices will have your mouth watering!

title: Fabulous Flavour on Every Level
description: How often do you reach for your Varoma when preparing meals? Find out how using all four levels of your Thermomix® can make your life so much easier… and delicious!

title: Filipino Favorites
description: A collection of Filipino favorites brings together the rich and diverse flavors of the Philippines, showcasing a mix of savory, sweet, and tangy dishes that reflect the country’s vibrant culture and history.

title: Thermomix® Cooking Demo Philippines
description: A menu collection for Thermomix® that features a selection of recipes designed to showcase the versatility, efficiency, and advanced functionalities of Thermomix® TM6. This collection includes dishes that highlight key cooking techniques, from chopping and sautéing to layer cooking and many more, demonstrating how effortlessly we can create a wide range of meals, from appetizers to desserts.

title: Discover Thermomix® Singapore
description: This exclusively curated recipe collection is specifically designed for sales team demonstrations in Singapore, showcasing the remarkable versatility and efficiency of our Thermomix®. Each recipe is crafted to appeal to a diverse range of tastes, guaranteeing a captivating and unforgettable demonstration experience every time. With this collection, you're not just presenting a product; you're creating an engaging culinary journey that impresses and delights your audience.

title: Discover Thermomix® Malaysia
description: This exclusively curated recipe collection is specifically designed for sales team demonstrations in Malaysia, showcasing the remarkable versatility and efficiency of our Thermomix®. Each recipe is crafted to appeal to a diverse range of tastes, guaranteeing a captivating and unforgettable demonstration experience every time. With this collection, you're not just presenting a product; you're creating an engaging culinary journey that impresses and delights your audience.

title: Let's Spiralize
description: Let’s spiralize to discover an exciting new accessory for your Thermomix® that will help you incorporate more vegetables into your meals. These dishes are easy to prepare and are perfect for everyday dining, as well as being crowd-pleasers for potlucks and parties. Transform any meal into an unforgettable experience for yourself and your guests.

title: Celebrate Eid Al-Fitr
description: Food is a huge part of the Raya celebration and Ramadan fasting month. End fasting days with fulfilling comfort food like the Middle Eastern Lamb Bamia; the Laksam, or Sayur Lodeh, with a refreshing and cooling beverage like Air Katira. No feast is complete without Rendang Tok with Pulut Kuning (turmeric glutinous rice), desserts and sweet bakes Kuih Qasidah and Biskut Arab. Get ideas from this 14-dish Raya festive collection with tried and tested, fail-proof recipes for these special occasions when our families gather.

title: Chocolate Lovers
description: Chocolate is the universal expression of love. Let Thermomix®️ help you warm the hearts of your loved ones with these hand-crafted decadent chocolate treats.

title: Easy Asian Home Cooking
description: Our Recipe Team has created this collection of easy Asian recipes that are packed full of flavours that you can make effortlessly at home with your Thermomix®. The recipes in this collection contain ingredients that are economical and readily available - perfect for all-day meals with your friends and family

title: Asian Party Bites
description: Plan your picture perfect festive parties with Thermomix! We’ve rounded up these popular crowd-pleasing potluck finger bites that are packed full of Asian flavours, effortless to prepare and easy to portion out for a crowd or to bring around to any parties!

title: Deepavali Festive Delights
description: Deepavali is Festival of Lights traditionally celebrated with prayers, rituals, gift-giving and food. Honour the occasion with these celebratory dishes for a blessed new year.

title: Everyday Asian with Thermomix® Cutter (TM6)
description: Whether its Asian salads like Rojak or Acar, snacks like Spring rolls and Fritters,  or rice dishes and mains, the recipes in this collection have integrated the new Thermomix® Cutter to automatically slice and grate ingredients evenly in seconds for every day dishes made even easier without the elbow grease!  Pssst ... with the Cutter settings included as part of each guided recipe, you’ll be seamlessly preparing and cooking every step without the need to remember settings too!

title: Everyday Asian with Thermomix® Cutter (TM5)
description: Whether its Asian salads like Rojak or Acar, snacks like Spring rolls and Fritters,  or rice dishes and mains, the recipes in this collection have integrated the new Thermomix® Cutter to automatically slice and grate ingredients evenly in seconds for every day dishes made even easier without the elbow grease!  Pssst ... with the Cutter settings included as part of each guided recipe, you’ll be seamlessly preparing and cooking every step without the need to remember settings too!

title: Sedap Recipes (Ramadan & Syawal 2024)
description: Celebrate Ramadan and Syawal with our curated array of sedap festive food that marks the beginning of Ramadan to the end of Syawal. From the quick and easy one pot noodles and sup tauhu kulit to the fancy rosalinda pineapple tarts, nostalgic sarsi, regional favourites like curry mee, sup kambing and kuzi ayam. This collection includes delectable mains, flavoursome one-pot dishes for iftar, sahur, potlucks and open houses for a meaningful fasting month and your lavish Raya spread!

title: Our Favourites
description: Discover in this collection the all-time favourites of Thermomix® customers in Malaysia and Singapore. From nasi lemak to curry chicken, from steamed buns to tangy dressings – with Thermomix® it’s all at your fingertips!

title: Gong xi fa cai - Chinese New Year 2023
description: Plan your auspicious menu for the Lunar New Year with these recipes; each curated for the occasion with symbolic lucky meanings, such as seafood to represent prosperity, fish for abundance, glutinous rice for “getting higher every year” and many more. With Thermomix®, you can easily prepare a sumptuous reunion dinner for your family!

title: Christmas Together
description: Looking for year-end holidays and festivities-worthy recipes? Look no further! Whether you're planning festive meals or hosting gatherings, check out this seasonal recipe collection inspired from around the world that you can put together easily with your Thermomix®.

title: Nourishing Confinement Food
description: A good postpartum diet for recuperating new mothers after childbirth is important. This is a nourishing collection of recipes that is thoughtfully crafted to aid new mothers in their postpartum journey to recovery during their confinement. Each recipe is designed to incorporate traditional herbs and essential nutrients in a tasty blend that improves digestion, supports healthy lactation with restorative elements for recuperation.

title: World Cuisine by Chef Koen Vessies
description: A compilation of Chef Koen’s personal favourite recipes that showcases his gourmet journey across the globe from Europe to Asia. Savour this collection of recipes that lets you taste the world.

title: Let's Celebrate Chinese New Year
description: Every year, millions of people around the world celebrate the Chinese Lunar New Year through family reunions, over a spread of auspicious dishes and desserts. This collection will not only give you ideas for what to serve your family and guests this coming Chinese New Year, it also provides you with tested, fail-proof recipes for you to impress them with. With the Thermomix®️ TM6, cooking for family gatherings and reunions has never been more enjoyable.

title: Christmas with Thermomix®
description: Christmas is the season of giving, and there's no better gift than the gift of food. With 17 recipes to choose from, Christmas Recipes with Thermomix® offers you a wide array of ideas to put on the table when you're gathered together with friends, family and loved ones.

title: Hot Pot Gathering
description: Hot pot or steamboat is a traditional communal feast in Asia where families and friends gather together to eat over a pot of flavourful broth with ingredients that vary from protein to vegetables that are cooked in a hearty simmering pot of soup stock in a manner similar to western fondue. The choice of the broth for the hot pot determines the ingredients, the dipping sauces and complementary side dishes. Whether you are a spicy food lover, a vegetarian, on keto diet, or a pescatarian, there’s something for everyone in this versatile Hot Pot Gathering collection.

title: Thermomix®️ Experience Menu
description: Love the dishes you tried during your Thermomix®️ Cooking Experience? Whether you're an Advisor, customer or new to Thermomix®️ cooking, these recipes will guide you to master the basic Thermomix®️ functions. Mix and match these recipes to build your meal menus!

title: Asian Sweet Treats with Sugar Stages
description: Experience the sweet science of sugar by using Sugar Stages to make Asian sweet treats. From caramel sauce, to Nian Gao, Bee Hive Cake and even traditional candies like Dodol, Dragon’s Beard Candy and Bing Tang Hu Lu, celebrate the sweetness in life with this collection of saccharine treats.

title: High Temp. Asian Cooking
description: Craving for some hearty staples and mains such as toasted peanuts and crispy ikan bilis to go with nasi lemak, or Zi Char meat and seafood dishes that normally requires oil and wok frying? Create tasty and healthier versions of these at home, using TM6’s High-Temp. function, to introduce flavourful “wok-like fragrance” into every dish!

title: Reunion Dishes
description: This is a compilation of festive celebratory dishes perfect for reunion with your loved ones. Be guided step-by-step from start till finish to prepare these auspicious dishes. Cook these lucky dishes to usher in luck and prosperity for you and your family this Chinese New Year.

title: One-Pot Rice Meals
description: One pot rice meals is your essential go-to collection when you are time-pressed to feed your family! Follow the guided recipes, add a few common ingredients you'll surely have in your kitchen and you’re on your way to creating fluffy and flavourful rice meals that are so easy-to-cook and surprisingly tasty! One pot rice classics such as cabbage pork belly rice, pumpkin brown rice, yam rice, olive rice, chicken mushrooms and sausage rice and more, can be cooked in under an hour to fill hungry tummies in no time.

title: Asian Chicken Dinners
description: Love a good chicken dinner? This collection compiles favourite chicken dishes from across Asia that are sure to please all ages and even the pickiest of eaters.  With simple step-by-step guidance, you can easily whip up quick and fuss-free authentic Asian chicken dishes such as Chicken Rendang, Korean Ginseng Chicken, Spicy Soy Sauce Chicken, Easy Char Siew Chicken, that will go well with just rice as a full meal!

title: Oriental Pork Dishes
description: This collection of Asian regional favourite pork dishes such as Tamarind Pork Curry, Hakka Char Yoke (braised pork), Chilli Vinegar Pork Trotter Stew or Pad Kra Pao (Thai basil minced pork), can be cooked so easily with Thermomix®.  A must-have collection for all pork lovers!

title: Vegan Desserts
description: Plant-based desserts are healthy and wholesome! Embark on a clean diet with vegan versions of evergreen dessert favourites like mochi, puddings, cakes, brownies and gelatos using your Thermomix®!

title: Spicy Asian
description: You can now make tantalising restaurant dishes at home with your Thermomix®! Adjust the spice levels of these regional restaurant favourites from Thai Tom Yam Goong to local dishes like Petai Prawn Sambal and Nonya Steamed Fish, according to how spicy you like them. This collection is perfect for spicy food lovers!

title: Peranakan Snack Delight
description: Peranakan cakes or kuehs/kuihs are bite-sized dessert snacks that have a long history since the 15th century in Southeast Asia. These traditional snacks come in different shapes, designs, colours and textures and commonly use local ingredients such as glutinous rice, pandan leaves, palm sugar (gula melaka) and coconut milk.

title: Asian Sweet Pastries
description: Travel across Asia with this collection! From popular Korean street food, to Japanese pastries and bread, to local Southeast Asian delights like honeycomb cake and roti sarang, ease your cravings and satiate your sweet tooth with these easy-to-follow recipes.

title: Let's Go Mamak
description: From Thosai and Chapati to Mee Goreng, from Nasi Lemak and Nasi Goreng to Teh Tarik… This collection comes with guided steps for traditional Southeast Asian dishes made simpler. Get your cravings for Malay-Indian street food from Malaysia and Singapore fixed right at home with your Thermomix®!

title: Chicken - quick & easy Asian favourites
description: Let your Thermomix® cook these tasty effortless Asian chicken dishes for you. From nourishing to spicy and regional specialties, we have you covered. There's a chicken dish to enjoy for every occasion, even when served with just plain rice!

title: Asian All-in-One
description: When you are time-pressed, grab any of these one pot recipes to whip up a meal effortlessly for the family in under an hour. You get quick and easy yet healthy and tasty comfort food that is bursting with flavours, all with the help of Thermomix®.

title: Perfection in 7 Days with Thermomix®
description: Embark on a Thermomix® journey for new owners to perfect your cooking skills in just one week, through 21 specially selected recipes covering key Thermomix® functions. From basics to more complex dishes that explore the new Thermomix® TM6 modes, you will master time-saving cooking with easy and simple-to-follow steps.

title: Asian Heritage Cupcakes
description: Reminiscing ah ma’s steamed cakes from our childhood days? Get your Varoma out to steam traditional Asian huat kuihs or "prosperity" cakes like pandan, red yeast, Sarawak ragi, palm sugar and black glutinous rice cakes and more!

title: Asian Flavour Mixes (TM5)
description: A recipe collection to create Asian condiments that are rich in flavours for authentic Asian tastes. Whether you prefer sweet, savoury or spicy – each of these recipes is an essential pantry staple and will add truly Asian flavours to your dishes.

title: Kneading: Asian Recipes
description: Get the best out of Thermomix®'s signature fast kneading function to make popular Asian bakery and street foods like soft-for-days tangzhong bread, curry chicken bun, mochi bun, roti canai, kaya kok and more!

title: Asian Flavour Mixes
description: A recipe collection to create Asian condiments that are rich in flavours for authentic Asian tastes. Whether you prefer sweet, savoury or spicy – each of these recipes is an essential pantry staple and will add truly Asian flavours to your dishes.

title: Slow Cook: Chinese Braises and Soups
description: Imagine succulent tender meats and rich nourishing broths - get step-by-step guide to cook the Asian ah ma’s (granny) comfort dishes easily with Thermomix Slow cook function.

title: Chinese New Year Festive Flavours
description: A carefully selected collection of festive Chinese New Year recipes, bursting with flavours from traditionally auspicious ingredients that symbolise prosperity and abundance in the year ahead.

title: Recettes du quotidien III
description: Voici nos meilleures recettes du quotidien, faciles à réaliser pour vous inspirer et régaler vos papilles.

title: Petit-déjeuner
description: Le petit déjeuner est le repas qui nous donne de l’énergie et qui permet de stimuler notre organisme dès le réveil pour bien commencer la journée ! Dans cette collection, vous trouverez nos meilleures recettes qui raviront vos papilles.

title: C'est le printemps !
description: C'est le printemps ! Retrouvez nos meilleures recettes gourmandes et colorées, de l'entrée au dessert, avec des produits de saison, pour régaler vos proches.

title: Tartelettes
description: Sucrées ou salées, ultra simples ou plus raffinées, ces tartelettes annoncent le printemps. Gourmandes et croustillantes, elles se déclinent en entrée, en plat ou en dessert pour combler toutes les envies, des recettes express aux créations les plus sophistiquées.

title: Autour de l'oignon
description: Si vous aimez les oignons, cette collection est faite pour vous. Retrouvez des recettes dédiées autour de l'oignon.

title: Vous les femmes
description: Cette collection, dédiée au bien-être et à la nutrition féminine, propose des recettes conçues pour favoriser vitalité et équilibre. Riches en nutriments essentiels, ces plats soutiennent l’énergie et la santé, tout en apportant plaisir et sérénité à chaque repas.

title: Petits budgets Vol. III
description: Se faire plaisir avec des plats peu onéreux, variés et délicieux ? C’est possible ! Craquez pour des courgettes farcies, un rougail saucisse, un sauté de porc au curry ou un savoureux cake aux pommes !

title: CHEESY
description: Des recettes gourmandes pour vous réchauffer le cœur.

title: Mix and match III
description: Pour gagner du temps en cuisine, retrouvez avec ces recettes simples et  basiques de quoi préparer des repas rapides au quotidien. Préparez en avance vos préparations pour vos repas de la semaine, et le tour est joué !

title: Autour de la carotte
description: Découvrez la carotte sous toutes ses formes avec 10 recettes créatives, gourmandes et surprenantes. Du salé au sucré, elle révèle toute sa douceur et sa richesse en saveurs !

title: Best of Saint-Valentin
description: Pour la Saint-Valentin, célébrez l'amour avec nos meilleurs petits plats pour deux, de l'apéritif au dessert.

title: Chaud Bouillon !
description: Réconfortants, économiques, sains et gourmands, les bouillons reviennent en force pour vous faire bénéficier de tous leurs bienfaits. Tendances, ils séduisent les gourmets par leurs créativités et se déclinent à l'infini.

title: Best of chandeleur
description: Fêtez la Chandeleur avec gourmandise à travers ces 10 recettes traditionnelles ou créatives qui raviront vos papilles. Soufflées, en samoussa ou encore assemblées en gâteau, garnies de noix de coco, de thé matcha ou de compote, en version sans gluten ou sans lactose, revisitez sans tarder la crêpe sous toutes ses formes...alors à vos crêpières !

title: Best of Chine
description: Retrouvez dans cette collection vos plats préférés de la cuisine chinoise, du porc aigre-doux jusqu’aux ravioli pékinois, en passant par le riz cantonais ou la salade Bo bun. Partagez en famille ou entre amis ces saveurs incomparables comme si vous étiez au restaurant !

title: Les cannelés
description: Le cannelé, la crème de la crème en pâtisserie ! Venez découvrir nos recettes qui sortent de l'ordinaire et qui vous permettront d'épater vos convives et vos papilles !

title: Les gratins
description: Des recettes simple et rapide, mais qui changent du quotidien !

title: Galettes des rois, le best-of
description: L'équipe Recettes vous propose un florilège des meilleures galettes des Rois, sucrées et salées, pour célébrer l’Epiphanie, ravir toutes les papilles et partager avec vos proches un moment gourmand !

title: Spécial Fêtes
description: Des recettes parfaites pour vous accompagner dans cette période de fêtes. Elles vont accompagneront pour épater vos convives ou les gâter de petites sucreries.

title: Best of Cuisson tout-en-un
description: Vous cherchez un moyen facile de créer un repas époustouflant avec des ingrédients de saison? Le Thermomix® est là pour vous aider: Explorez la fonctionnalité de cuisson à plusieurs niveaux avec notre collection de plats, et apportez de la saveur à votre table en toute simplicité.

title: Douceurs épicées
description: Découvrez les saveurs vibrantes de notre collection "Douceurs épicées". Savourez le mélange parfait de sucré et de piquant, combiné dans des plats qui vous surprendront et vous raviront. Préparez-vous à une aventure culinaire unique où chaque bouchée déborde de saveur !

title: Cookidoo à table 2024
description: Pourquoi partager seulement un repas autour d'une table, quand vous pouvez partager votre parcours culinaire avec votre famille et vos amis. Ainsi, nous avons créé Cookidoo® à table 2024 : un outil passionnant, accessible uniquement sur mobile, qui donne un aperçu de votre cuisine personnelle pour l'année ! Mais ne vous arrêtez pas en si bon chemin ! Découvrez aussi les 10 recettes les plus cuisinées en France en 2024 !

title: Best-Of Soupes et Veloutés
description: Retrouvez nos recettes de soupes et veloutés qui vont changer votre quotidien.

title: Larousse - Mes recettes de fêtes
description: Noël, Pâques, un anniversaire… il y a toujours une belle occasion pour se réunir et se régaler tous ensemble ! Votre Thermomix® sera votre meilleur allié pour composer un menu à la hauteur de l’événement. Choisissez parmi ces délicieuses recettes de fêtes spécialement conçues pour votre machine et épatez vos invités ! De l’apéritif au dessert, préparez un véritable festin sans stress et sans effort.

title: Saveurs d'Orient
description: Plongez dans ces merveilleuses recettes qui vont feront voyager !

title: 30 Minutes
description: Réalisez un savoureux repas en un rien de temps avec notre sélection de recettes rapides. Prêts en seulement 30 minutes, ces plats s'adaptent parfaitement à un emploi du temps chargé. Qui aurait pensé qu'un repas rapide pouvait être aussi délicieux ?

title: Snacks sains et gourmands
description: Découvrez "Snacks sains et gourmands", une collection de recettes sucrées et salées qui allient originalité et équilibre.

title: Escapade en Colombie
description: Plongez dans l'authenticité de la Colombie avec cette collection de recettes. Des plats riches en saveurs et en couleurs, parfaits pour une évasion culinaire depuis votre cuisine !

title: Petits plaisirs coupables
description: Des recettes sucrées et gourmandes pour se faire plaisir, à n'importe quel moment !

title: Blanc scintillant
description: Succombez au Blanc scintillant ! Le Thermomix® s’habille d'une nouvelle robe blanche et pour l'occasion, les recettes aussi ! Des entrées, plats et douceurs du quotidien ou plus raffinés, à partager entre amis ou en famille.

title: Un Noël enchanté
description: Avec l'arrivée du Père Noël et les premières chutes de neige, nos recettes rempliront votre maison des saveurs authentiques de la saison. Des biscuits à déposer au coin du feu aux desserts qui rendront votre dîner inoubliable, chaque recette capture la magie de Noël.Retrouvez nos accessoires de Noël directement sur l'e-shop Thermomix.

title: Friteuse à air
description: Maintenant que vous connaissez le Thermomix Sensor, préparez-vous à cuisiner ces recettes avec notre accessoire préféré et la friteuse à air. Découvrez une variété de recettes où nous combinons l'utilisation du Thermomix + Thermomix Sensor + Friteuse à air avec l'utilisation de différentes protéines ainsi que des desserts, des pains et des gâteaux.

title: Best-of Octobre
description: Retrouvez des recettes gourmandes qui vous accompagneront pour les mois d'octobre ou plus encore.

title: Larousse - Recettes orientales
description: Embarquez pour un voyage culinaire ensoleillé aux parfums de l’Orient ! De Marrakech à Tunis, d’Alger jusqu’à Beyrouth, découvrez les incontournables, ainsi que des spécialités moins connues, et régalez-vous avec ces plats généreux, colorés et épicés. Couscous, tajines, keftas, pastillas, pains plats, bricks, baklavas, cornes de gazelle… Des petits plats du quotidien aux recettes pour les grandes tablées, sans oublier les mezze ni les douceurs, goûtez aux mille et une saveurs des cuisines orientales grâce à 100 recettes spécialement conçues pour votre Thermomix® ! Envie de découvrir ce livre ? Rendez-vous sur notre E-shop : Inspiration recettes.

title: Été indien
description: Prolongez l'été dans vos assiettes grâce à nos délicieuses salades, soupes froides et autres tatins de légumes de saison hautes en couleur, qui vous apporteront fraîcheur et vitamines pour bien attaquer l'automne.

title: Ma grossesse sereine et gourmande
description: Pour vivre une grossesse sereine et tout en gourmandise, retrouvez nos délicieuses recettes d'entrées, plats et desserts, réparties sur 3 trimestres,  ainsi que les conseils d'une nutritionniste, afin de répondre à vos besoins nutritionnels et ceux de votre votre bébé.

title: Basiques - Pâtes
description: Découvrez une sélection de recettes de pâtes basiques, telles que la pâte sablée et la pâte à tortillas, idéales pour devenir vos incontournables du quotidien.

title: Basiques - Pains et Viennoiseries
description: Découvrez une sélection de recettes de pains et viennoiseries basiques, parfaites pour devenir vos incontournables du quotidien.

title: Basiques - Confitures et compotées
description: Découvrez une sélection de recettes de confitures et compotées basiques, parfaites pour devenir vos incontournables du quotidien.

title: Basiques - Yaourts et crèmes dessert
description: Découvrez une sélection de recettes de yaourts et crèmes dessert basiques, parfaites pour devenir vos incontournables du quotidien.

title: Simple & Rapide
description: Profitez d'un repas rapide et savoureux avec des ingrédients simples, à déguster pendant vos pauses déjeuner ou après le sport. Des petits plats et desserts réalisés en un clin d'oeil, à tout moment et en tout lieu !

title: Best of flans - automne
description: Voici nos meilleurs flans salés ou sucrés pour l'automne.

title: Les tendances
description: Inspiré par les réseaux sociaux, l'esprit de ces recettes c'est la spontanéité. C'est une envie de s'affranchir des codes culinaires, de recherche d'évasion, de suivre ses envies et de tout miser sur le plaisir de l’instant présent.

title: Autour de la figue
description: Redécouvrez ce joli fruit de saison à travers 12 recettes salées et sucrées surprenantes, pour accompagner du poisson, relever un camembert, parfumer une sauce de pâtes, fourrer des biscuits ou encore aromatiser une moutarde !

title: Mon régime Keto
description: Vous suivez un régime cétogène? Alors cette collection de 12 recettes est faite pour vous ! Régalez-vous sans culpabiliser de l'entrée au dessert, tout en surveillant votre ligne.

title: Mix and Match II
description: Envie de vous faciliter la vie en cuisine ? Cette collection est faite pour vous : retrouvez 20 recettes simples et rapides pour le quotidien. Des basiques pour préparer pendant le week-end vos repas de la semaine et les goûters de vos enfants. Mixez et matchez à volonté !

title: Back to school, spécial goûter
description: Découvrez "Back to School, Spécial Goûters" : une collection de 20 recettes de gâteaux et biscuits savoureux pour adoucir la rentrée. Des créations faciles à réaliser avec des ingrédients simples.

title: Vive le mois d'août
description: Vive le mois d'août est là pour vous donner de l'inspiration pour vos soirées BBQ ou vos déjeuners sur la plage. Laissez vous guider et régalez-vous !

title: Recettes healthy pour l'été
description: Préparez-vous à briller de mille feux cet été ! Plongez dans notre collection de recettes légères qui vous donneront de l'énergie et vous prépareront à conquérir la journée. Des délices ensoleillés du petit-déjeuner aux bouchées rafraîchissantes du midi, en passant par les en-cas rassasiants, nous avons tout prévu pour les journées ensoleillées qui s'annoncent !

title: Frozen cocktails
description: Découvrez nos recettes de cocktails glacés façon granités. Parfaits pour les chaudes soirées d'été ou toute occasion spéciale. Cheers !

title: Escapade en Thaïlande
description: Entrez dans le monde envoûtant de la cuisine thaïlandaise. Ce voyage culinaire vous invite à savourer les saveurs vibrantes et variées qui définissent le cœur et l'âme de la Thaïlande. Des marchés de rue animés aux cuisines familiales, chaque recette capture l'essence du pays du sourire.

title: Plateau télé
description: Retrouvez une sélection de recettes festives et conviviales, parfaites pour agrémenter vos apéros et soirées télé. L'été va être sportif, alors savourez chaque moment en dégustant nos délicieuses créations.

title: Boissons estivales
description: C'est l'heure de l'apéro ! Pour savourer l'été en toute tranquillité avec vos proches et vos amis, vous pourrez proposer et goûter ces 10 délicieuses recettes de boissons sans alcool, colorées et rafraîchissantes.

title: Nos glaces et sorbets
description: Nos glaces et sorbets préférés pour un été tout en douceur et rafraîchissant.

title: Autour du melon
description: En verrine, en carpaccio avec une sauce asiatique, en billes dans votre salade de pâtes préférée, en smoothie, en granité ou tout simplement en sorbet pour apprécier sa fraîcheur, le melon se décline sous toutes les formes, de l'apéritif au dessert.

title: Tartines d'été
description: Les tartines sont un véritable plaisir ! En été, c'est l'occasion parfaite pour y intégrer les délicieux produits de saison. Qu'elles soient sucrées ou salées, elles sont toujours un régal ! Accompagnées d'une salade, ces tartines offrent un repas simple et gourmand, idéal pour les beaux jours.

title: Vive l'été !
description: Un best-of garni de recettes pour vous suivre pendant la saison d'été !

title: Apéro et Tapas
description: Pour un apéritif réussi, retrouvez toutes nos recettes à déguster en famille ou entre amis.

title: Spécial conseillers avec le Sensor
